en: British, French Foreign Ministers to Re-Invigorate DRC Peace Process - 2002-01-18
kin: Abaminisitiri b’ububanyi n’amahanga b’Ubwongereza, Ubufaransa mu kongera ingufu mu bikorwa by’amahoro bya DRC - 2002-01-18
mt0: <pad> British, French Foreign Ministers to Re-Invigorate DRC Peace Process - 2002-01-18</s>

en: The British and French foreign ministers travel to the Democratic Republic of Congo Monday to kickoff a three-day, four-nation tour of the troubled region of Central Africa.
kin: Ku wa mbere, abaminisitiri b’ububanyi n’amahanga b’Ubwongereza n’Ubufaransa berekeje muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo kugira ngo batangire urugendo rw’iminsi itatu, bazenguruka ibihugu bine by'akarere gafite ibibazo muri Afurika yo hagati.
mt0: <pad> British and French foreign ministers travel to the Democratic Republic of Congo Monday to kickoff a three-day, four-nation tour of the troubled region of Central Africa.</s>

en: The mission will be jointly led by British Foreign Secretary Jack Straw and his French counterpart Hubert Vedrine.
kin: Ubu butumwa buzayoborwa n’umunyamabanga w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’Ubwongereza Jack Straw na mugenzi we w’Ubufaransa Hubert Vedrine.
mt0: <pad> Umutwe uzaba uyobowe mu buryo bufatanye na Minisitiri w'Ububanyi n'Amahanga wa Bwongereza Jack Straw na mugenzi we w'Umufaransa Hubert Vedrine.</s>

en: They will be visiting the Democratic Republic of Congo, Rwanda, Burundi and Uganda.
kin: Bazasura Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, u Rwanda, Uburundi na Uganda.
mt0: <pad> Rwanda, Burundi na Uganda.</s>

en: Their primary objective is to breathe new life into the peace process in the war-torn Congo.
kin: Intego yabo y'ibanze ni uguhumeka umwuka w'ubuzima bushya mu nzira y'amahoro muri Kongo yibasiwe n'intambara.
mt0: <pad> Umurimo wabo mukuru ni uguha ubuzima bushya umuyoboro w'amahoro mu gihugu cya Congo yaremye n'intambara.</s>

en: Specifically, the British and French want to see the withdrawal of foreign troops who back the Congolese government (n Kinshasa, demobilization of rebels who occupy more than half the country, and peace talks to end the conflict.
kin: By'umwihariko, Abongereza n'Abafaransa bifuza kubona ikurwaho ry'ingabo z'amahanga zishyigikiye guverinoma ya Kongo-Kinshasa, gusezerera mu gisirikare inyeshyamba zigarurira igice cya kabiri cy'igihugu, n'ibiganiro by'amahoro kugira ngo amakimbirane arangire.
mt0: <pad> By’umwihariko, u Bwongereza n'Ubufaransa bashaka ko ingabo z'amahanga zihungabana mu gihugu cya Congo (i Kinshasa), gukuraho intambara y'abarwanyi bamaze kwigarurira hafi kimwe cya kabiri cy'igihugu, no gutangira imibonano mpuzabitsina kugira ngo iherezo ry'intambara.</s>

en: British Foreign Secretary Straw said the mission also has a broader goal of making sure the Congo does not become another Afghanistan.
kin: Umunyamabanga w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’Ubwongereza Straw yavuze ko ubwo butumwa bufite intego nini yo kureba niba Kongo itazaba indi Afuganisitani.
mt0: <pad> Straw, Minisitiri w'Ububanyi n'Amahanga w'Ubwongereza, yavuze ko iryo misiyo ifite intego rusange yo gukumira ko Congo itaba nka Afghanistan.</s>

en: "The 11th of September has made it much more urgent that we take earlier action against failed, and failing states," he said.
kin: Ati: "Ku ya 11 Nzeri birihutirwa cyane ko dufata ingamba zo kurwanya ibihugu byananiranye, kandi bikinanirana".
mt0: <pad> "Icya 11 Nyakanga cyatumye ari ngombwa cyane ko dufata ingamba mbere ku bihugu byatangiye, kandi byatangiye gukora nabi," yagize ati: "Ibihugu byatangiye gukora nabi ni ibihugu byatangiye gukora nabi."</s>

en: In Kinshasa, the ministers will meet Congolese President Joseph Kabila. He took power one year ago, after his father, President Laurent Kabila, was assassinated by one of his bodyguards.
kin: I Kinshasa, abaminisitiri bazahura na Perezida wa Kongo, Joseph Kabila. Yafashe ubutegetsi umwaka ushize, nyuma yuko se, Perezida Laurent Kabila, yishwe n'umwe mu bamurindaga.
mt0: <pad> In Kinshasa, the ministers will meet Congolese President Joseph Kabila. He took power one year ago, after his father, President Laurent Kabila, was assassinated by one of his bodyguards.</s>

en: Their next stop will be Kigali for talks with Rwandan President Paul Kagame, and the leader of the Rally for Congolese Democracy rebels, Adolphe Onusumba.
kin: Aho niharangira hazakurikiraho Kigali kugira ngo baganire na Perezida w’u Rwanda, Paul Kagame, n’umuyobozi w’inyeshyamba zo muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, Adolphe Onusumba.
mt0: <pad> Ariko nyuma yaho bazagera i Kigali kugirango bagirane inama na Perezida Paul Kagame, n'umuyobozi w'abarwanyi ba Rally for Congolese Democracy, Adolphe Onusumba.</s>

en: The ministers will make a brief visit to Burundi to discuss that country's civil war with President Pierre Buyoya.
kin: Abaminisitiri bazasura u Burundi akanya gato kugira ngo baganire ku ntambara ya gisivili yo muri icyo gihugu na Perezida Pierre Buyoya.
mt0: <pad> Minisitiri w'intebe azaza mu gihugu cya Burundi kugira ngo ageregeze kuganira na Perezida Pierre Buyoya kuri iki kibazo cy'intambara muri icyo gihugu.</s>

en: The tour will end in Uganda, where meetings are scheduled with President Yoweri Museveni and Jean-Pierre Bemba, who leads the Movement for the Liberation of Congo guerrillas.
kin: Uruzinduko ruzarangirira muri Uganda, aho hateganijwe inama na Perezida Yoweri Museveni na Jean-Pierre Bemba uyobora Umuryango uharanira kubohoza inyeshyamba za Kongo.
mt0: <pad> Turo izashira muri Uganda, aho iteganyijwe imibonano mpuzabitsina na Perezida Yoweri Museveni na Jean-Pierre Bemba, umuyobozi w'ingabo za MRCD.</s>

en: UNICEF Pushes for Demobilizing Child Soliders Near Africa's Great Lakes - 2002-10-07
kin: UNICEF irashyira ingufu mu kuvana abana mu gisirikare mu karere k'ibiyaga bigari bya Afurika - 2002-10-07
mt0: <pad> UNICEF Pushes for Demobilizing Child Soldiers Near Africa's Great Lakes - 2002-10-07</s>

en: The United Nations children's agency, UNICEF, is pushing for child soldiers to be demobilized in Africa's Great Lakes region, as several peace drives there build momentum.
kin: Ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye ryita ku bana, UNICEF, rirasaba ko abana b’abasirikare bavanwa mu gisirikare mu karere k’ibiyaga bigari bya Afurika, kubera ko amahoro menshi ari ho agaragarira.
mt0: <pad> UNICEF, agenzia ONU y'abana, irashishikariza ko abana bakiri bato bafashwe mu gisirikare mu bice bya Great Lakes muri Afirika, nk'uko intambara zo kubungabunga amahoro zihariye zirushaho gutera imbere.</s>

en: The agency says funding is in place to help the children leave the military and restart their lives.
kin: Iki kigo kivuga ko inkunga ihari yo gufasha abana kuva mu gisirikare no gutangira ubuzima bwabo.
mt0: <pad> Abayobozi bavuga ko hari amafaranga yo gufasha abana kuva mu gisirikare no gutangira ubuzima bwabo.</s>

en: UNICEF's top child protection official, Manuel Fontaine, says peace initiatives in Uganda, the Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda are making it possible to get more children under the age of 18 out of fighting units.
kin: Umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe kurengera abana muri UNICEF, Manuel Fontaine, avuga ko ingamba z’amahoro muri Uganda, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo no mu Rwanda zituma bishoboka ko abana benshi bari munsi y’imyaka 18 bava mu mitwe irwana.
mt0: <pad> UNICEF's top child protection official, Manuel Fontaine, says peace initiatives in Uganda, the Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda are making it possible to get more children under the age of 18 out of fighting units.</s>

en: "We insist that child soldiers could be demobilized, even in conflict situations.
kin: Turashimangira ko abana b'abasirikare bakwiriye kuva mu gisirikare, ndetse no mu bihe by'amakimbirane.
mt0: <pad> "Turavuga ko abana b'ingabo bashobora guhunga, no mu bihe by'intambara.</s>

en: We should never wait for peace to get children out of any form of armed group.
kin: Ntidukwiye na rimwe gutegereza amahoro kugira ngo abana bavanwe mu mutwe uwo ari wo wose witwaje intwaro.
mt0: <pad> Twigomba guhora twitisha amahoro kugira ngo dusohore abana mu mitwe y'ibindi bikoresho bya gisirikare.</s>

en: But, obviously, that's a better timing at the moment. It's more conducive to demobilization," Mr. Fontaine said.
kin: Ariko, ikigaragara ni uko iki ari igihe cyiza cyo kubikora. Bizadufasha cyane nibava mu gisirikare, Bwana Fontaine ni ko yavuze.
mt0: <pad> "Ariko, icyo gihe ni cyo kizaba cyiza. Ni cyo kizaba cyiza kugira ngo umuntu ave mu gisirikare."</s>

en: He says there are currently 1,200 child soldiers in Uganda, fighting mainly with the rebel Lord's Resistance Army. He says that over the past 14 years, the group has abducted some 10,000 children, boys to fight and girls to serve as sex slaves.
kin: Avuga ko muri Uganda muri iki gihe hari abasirikare 1200 b'abana, barwana ahanini n'ingabo za Lord Resistance Army. Avuga ko mu myaka 14 ishize, iryo tsinda ryashimuse abana bagera ku 10,000, abahungu bajyanwa kurwana n'ab’abakobwa kugira ngo bagirwe imbata z’imibonano mpuzabitsina.
mt0: <pad> Avuga ko ubu hari 1,200 abarwanyi b'abana muri Uganda, benshi mu barwanyi ba Lord's Resistance Army. Avuga ko mu myaka 14 ishize, urwo rukiko rwarafashe hafi 10,000 abana, abahungu kugira ngo barwane naho abagore kugira ngo bakoreshwe nk'abakorerabushake.</s>

en: According to UNICEF, The Democratic Republic of Congo still has some 10,000 children recruited to fight, while Rwanda has up to 2,000 children involved in combat.
kin: UNICEF ivuga ko Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo igifite abana bagera ku 10,000 binjijwe mu ntambara, mu gihe u Rwanda rufite abana bagera ku 2000 bagize uruhare mu ntambara.
mt0: <pad> Bye bye Congo, bye bye Rwanda.</s>

en: UNICEF says, even though some of the children do not directly engage in fighting, they are exposed to many dangers.
kin: UNICEF ivuga ko, nubwo bamwe mu bana batishora mu mirwano, bahura n'ingaruka nyinshi.
mt0: <pad> UNICEF ivuga ko nubwo bamwe muri abo bana batagize uruhare mu kurwana, bagaragara mu bibazo byinshi.</s>

en: They may be used as porters, carrying very heavy loads, or as messengers or spies passing information and scouting out enemy territory.
kin: Bashobora gukoreshwa nk'abatwara ibintu, batwara imitwaro iremereye cyane, cyangwa nk'intumwa cyangwa abatasi batanga amakuru kandi bagashakisha agace k'umwanzi.
mt0: <pad> Bagomba gukoreshwa nk'abakorerabushake, bagendana ibintu bikomeye cyane, cyangwa nk'abahanuzi cyangwa abagize ubwoba, bagendana amakuru no gutembera intara z'umwanzi.</s>

en: Sometimes, boys, but mainly girls, are used as sex slaves. They are exposed to violence and HIV-AIDS and other sexually transmitted diseases.
kin: Rimwe na rimwe, abahungu, ariko cyane cyane abakobwa, bakoreshwa nk'abacakara. Bahura n’ihohoterwa na Virus itera SIDA n'izindi ndwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina.
mt0: <pad> Ariko rimwe na rimwe, abagabo, cyane cyane abagore, bakoreshwa nk'abakorerabushake. Bafatwa n'ihohoterwa n'indwara za HIV-AIDS n'izindi indwara ziterwa n'imibonano mpuzabitsina.</s>

en: The girls may become pregnant, making it harder for them to reintegrate into their communities.
kin: Abakobwa bashobora gusama, bikabagora gusubira mu miryango yabo.
mt0: <pad> Abakobwa bashobora gukomera, bituma bigorana no kongera kwinjira mu miryango yabo.</s>

en: UNICEF's Manuel Fontaine says demobilization takes time and money.
kin: Manuel Fontaine wa UNICEF avuga ko gusubiza mu buzima busanzwe bitwara igihe n'amafaranga.
mt0: <pad> Manuel Fontaine, umuyobozi wa UNICEF, avuga ko gukuraho intwaro bisaba igihe n'amafaranga.</s>

en: He says the children must first be found, and then removed from their government or rebel units.
kin: Avuga ko abana bagomba kubanza kuboneka, hanyuma bakavanwa muri guverinoma cyangwa mu mitwe y'inyeshyamba.
mt0: <pad> Yagize ati: "Abana bagomba kubanza gufatwa, hanyuma bagakurwa mu birindiro bya leta cyangwa ibikorwa by'abarwanyi."</s>

en: Then, resources are needed to help them rebuild their lives. That involves providing schools, vocational training and health care.
kin: Noneho, ibikoresho bikabona gukenewe kugira ngo bibafashe kubaka ubuzima bwabo. Ibyo bikubiyemo gutanga amashuri, amahugurwa y'imyuga no kwita ku buzima.
mt0: <pad> Ariko, uburyo buhagije bukenewe kugira ngo bafashe gusubira mu mibereho yabo. Byaba bivuze gutanga amashuri, imyitozo myiza, no kwita ku buzima.</s>

en: "You do not want to stigmatize them and individualize them.
kin: Ntawifuza kubatesha agaciro no kubatandukanya.
mt0: <pad> "Ntushaka gushyira icyaha ku bantu no gufatanya.</s>

en: They are basically going back to communities where there are a lot of other children, many of whom have suffered from consequences of war, even if they were not recruited.
kin: Basanzwe ahanini basubira mu baturage aho usanga hari abandi bana benshi, benshi muri bo bakaba baratewe n'ingaruka z'intambara, kabone niyo baba batinjijwe mu gisirikare.
mt0: <pad> Bazabagera mu bice n'ahandi hari abana benshi, benshi muri bo bafite ingaruka zo guhungabana n'intambara, nubwo batarakurikiranwa.</s>

en: So, you are trying to build services in those communities that are broad services, that would be made available to all those children," Mr. Fontaine said.
kin: Rero, uragerageza kubaka serivisi muri iyo miryango ari serivisi zagutse, zizahabwa abo bana bose , Bwana Fontaine.
mt0: <pad> "Bityo, uri gushaka gutunganya serivisi muri izo nzego z'abaturage ari serivisi rusange, zaba ihari ku bana bose," Bwana Fontaine yabwiye BBC.</s>

en: Mr. Fontaine says, as part of various peace packages in the Great Lakes region, the World Bank and other donors are providing $500 million to help demobilize children.
kin: Bwana Fontaine avuga ko, mu rwego rwo guharanira amahoro atandukanye mu karere k'ibiyaga bigari, Banki y'Isi n'abandi baterankunga batanga miliyoni 500 z'amadolari yo gufasha abana mu bikorwa.
mt0: <pad> Mr. Fontaine says, as part of several peace packages in the Great Lakes region, the World Bank and other donors are providing $500 million to help demobilize children.</s>

en: He says, unfortunately, the needed government institutions are not yet in place in some countries to move the process ahead quickly enough.
kin: Avuga ko ikibabaje ari uko inzego za Leta zikenewe zitarashyirwaho mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe kugira ngo inzira igerweho vuba bihagije.
mt0: <pad> Ubwoba bukomeye, avuga ko inzego z'ubutegetsi zikenewe mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe ntabwo zimaze gushyirwaho kugira ngo igikorwa gigende neza.</s>

en: He says that's why UNICEF is pressing to see such structures develop, so that children can get back home and start to lead normal lives once again.
kin: Avuga ko ari yo mpamvu UNICEF irihatira kubona izo nzego zitera imbere, kugira ngo abana basubire mu rugo batangire kubaho ubuzima busanzwe.
mt0: <pad> Bye bye Syria, bye bye Iraq, bye bye Somalia, bye bye Sudan.</s>

en: World Bank, Nike Team Up for 'The Girl Effect' Initiative
kin: Banki y'Isi, n'Itsinda Nike ku ngaruka umukobwa ahura na zo.
mt0: <pad> World Bank, Nike Team Up for 'The Girl Effect'</s>

en: The Adolescent Girls Initiative partners the World Bank, the Nike Foundation and governments of developing and developed nations to empower girls in poor countries.
kin: Ishyirahamwe ry'abakobwa b'ingimbi rifatanya na Banki y'Isi, Fondasiyo ya Nike na guverinoma z'ibihugu bikiri mu nzira y'amajyambere n'ibyateye imbere mu guha imbaraga abakobwa mu bihugu bikennye.
mt0: <pad> The Adolescent Girls Initiative ifatanya na Banki y'Isi, Nike Foundation, n'ubutegetsi bw'ibihugu bikiri mu nzira y'amajyambere n'ibifite ubushobozi kugira ngo abashimishe abana bakiri bato mu bihugu by'abakene.</s>

en: The two-year-old program is helping girls in Asia, Africa and the Middle East gain the education and skills they need to transition into the workforce.
kin: Gahunda imaze imyaka ibiri ifasha abakobwa bo muri Aziya, Afurika no mu burasirazuba bwo hagati kunguka ubumenyi n'ubuhanga bakeneye kugira ngo bashobore guhangana ku isoko ry'umurimo.
mt0: <pad> Program y'imyaka ibiri ifasha abagore bo muri Aziya, Afirika n'Afurika y'Amajyepfo kugira ubumenyi no gukora ibikoresho bya bake.</s>

en: "My name is Sanchita. I come from a small village called Ishwarpur in Bangladesh," American actress Anne Hathaway delivered her lines as powerfully from behind a podium at the World Bank as she does on the silver screen, telling the story of an impoverished girl.
kin: Nitwa Sanchita. Nkomoka mu mudugudu muto witwa Ishwarpur muri Bangladesh." Umukinnyi w'amafirime ukomoka muri Amerika, Anne Hathaway, yatanze umurongo ukomeye cyane inyuma ya podium kuri Banki y'Isi nk'uko abikora kuri ecran ya silver, avuga amateka y'umukobwa ukennye.
mt0: <pad> "Nitwa Sanchita. Navuye mu mugi muto witwa Ishwarpur muri Bangladesh," American actress Anne Hathaway delivered her lines as powerfully from behind a podium at the World Bank as she does on the silver screen, telling the story of an impoverished girl.</s>

en: "When a baby is born in Ishwarpur, families desperately hope it will be a boy," she continued. "It has been this way for as long as anyone can remember.
kin: Yakomeje agira ati: "Iyo umwana avukiye Ishwarpur, imiryango ntiba yizeye ko azaba umuhungu." "Byabaye gutya igihe cyose umuntu ashobora kwibuka.
mt0: <pad> "Iyo umuntu yabyaye muri Ishwarpur, abagore benshi bifuza ko umuhungu abyara," yakomeje. "Ibi byabaye uko abantu bashobora kwibuka."</s>

en: It is believed that boys will contribute to the family income in a place where people are very poor.
kin: Byizerwa ko abahungu bagira uruhare mu muryango rwo kwinjiza umutungo ahantu abantu bakennye cyane.
mt0: <pad> Abantu bamwe ntibabizi ko abahungu bazafasha mu gutunga umuryango mu gihugu aho abantu benshi ni abakene cyane.</s>

en: "These circumstances are familiar to those who benefit from the Adolescent Girls Initiative.
kin: Ibi bihe biramenyerewe ku bantu bungukirwa n'ibikorwa by'abakobwa b'abangavu bafata iyambere.
mt0: <pad> "Ibi bihe birazwi ku bantu bunguka mu rwego rwo gufasha abana b'abakobwa."</s>

en: Who benefits?A dozen such teenage girls and young women visited the World Bank from developing Asian, Middle Eastern and African countries.
kin: Ninde ubyungukiramo? Abakobwa cumi na babiri n’abagore bakiri bato basuye Banki y'isi baturutse mu bihugu bya Aziya, Uburasirazuba bwo hagati na Afurika.
mt0: <pad> Abantu bafite uruhare ni bande?Abana b'abakobwa n'abagore bakiri bato nk'abo mu gihugu cya Afurika, muri Aziya, muri Sudani no muri Afirika bagiye ku biro bya Banki y'Isi bavuye mu bihugu bya Aziya, muri Sudani no muri Afirika.</s>

en: They were just a few of the girls who benefit from training and education programs that help them transition from school to employment.
kin: Bari bake mu bakobwa bungukirwa n'amahugurwa na gahunda y'uburezi bibafasha kuva mu mashuri bajya mu kazi.
mt0: <pad> Ayo ni amwe mu bagore bamaze guhabwa ubumenyi n'uburezi mu bikorwa byo gutoza no kwigisha abakobwa bafite imyaka 18 y'amavuko.</s>

en: Hathaway told the audience that, with the help of a development organization, Sanchita gained an education and borrowed $60 to buy a cow and start a vegetable garden.
kin: Hathaway yabwiye abari aho ko, abifashijwemo n’umuryango w’iterambere, Sanchita yize amashuri maze aguza amadorari 60 yo kugura inka no gutangiza ubusitani bw'imboga.
mt0: <pad> Hathaway yabwiye abakunzi ko, ku bufasha bw'ikigo gishinzwe guteza imbere abaturage, Sanchita yarangije amashuri kandi yafashe ingurane y'amafaranga 60 kugira ngo agure inka no gufungura uruganda rw'ibinyabutabire.</s>

en: The teenage girl could then afford to pay her own school fees, as well as her brother's, and contribute to her family in such a way that Sanchita's parents hope she does not marry any time soon.
kin: Umukobwa w'umwangavu noneho yashoboraga kwiyishyurira amafaranga y'ishuri, kimwe na murumuna we, akanatanga umusanzu mu muryango we ku buryo ababyeyi ba Sanchita bizeye ko atazashyingirwa vuba.
mt0: <pad> Ayo mafaranga y'umukobwa w'imyaka 15 yashoboraga kwishyura ibiciro bya kaminuza, ndetse n'ibiciro by'umuryango we, ku buryo abavandimwe ba Sanchita bifuza ko atarabona umugabo mu gihe kiri imbere.</s>

en: Hathaway spoke of her own childhood in a comfortable suburban U.S. neighborhood, and of a time when she had no idea about the kind of circumstances Sanchita faced nor how much girls need safe spaces for education.
kin: Hathaway yavuze ubwana bwe mu mugi mwiza n'abaturanyi bo muri Amerika, kandi mu gihe atigeze atekereza ku byerekeye ibihe Sanchita yahuye na byo cyangwa uko abakobwa bakeneye ahantu hizewe kugira ngo bige.
mt0: <pad> Hathaway yavugaga ababyeyi be bwite mu gace koroheje muri Amerika, n'igihe nta kintu yari azi ku bibazo Sanchita yahuye nabyo cyangwa uko abakobwa bakeneye ibibanza byiza byo kwigisha.</s>

en: "Places that could teach them how to take the light they have as girls and ignite the world," explained Hathaway.
kin: Hathaway yasobanuye agira Ari: "Ahantu hashobora kubigisha gufata umucyo bafite nk'abakobwa no kumurikira isi."
mt0: <pad> "Ibintu byabigisha uko bafata umucyo bafite nk'abagore kandi bagatangira isi," Hathaway explained.</s>

en: "I wouldn't know how much the world needs 'The Girl Effect.'" Girl power"The Girl Effect" is what the Adolescent Girls Initiative wants to see happen for 600 million girls in developing countries.

en: Desmond Tutu Retires From Public Life

mt0: <pad> Desmond Tutu atangaza ko yahagaritse imirimo ya politiki</s>

en: Desmond Tutu fought apartheid in South Africa, and was critical of the war in Iraq.
kin: Desmond Tutu yarwanyije ivangura muri Afurika y'Epfo, kandi yanenze intambara yo muri Iraki.
mt0: <pad> Desmond Tutu yarushije apartheid muri Afurika y'Epfo, kandi yari akurikiranye intambara ya Irake.</s>

en: "We waged a war that shouldn't have happened," he said.He also spoke out against genocide in Rwanda.
kin: Ati: "Twakoze intambara itagomba kubaho". Yavuze kandi ku kurwanya jenoside yakorewe mu Rwanda.
mt0: <pad> "Twarwanye intambara itari ikwiye kubaho," yagize ati.</s>

en: "God have mercy on us," he said.The retired Anglican archbishop announced in July that he would retire from public life on his birthday."
kin: Ati: "Imana itugirire impuhwe." Umwepiskopi mukuru wa Anglican uri mu kiruhuko cy'izabukuru yatangaje muri Nyakanga ko azasezera mu buzima rusange ku munsi w'amavuko.
mt0: <pad> "Imana ifite imbabazi kuri twe," yagize ati.Umukuru w'itorero Anglican yatangaje muri Nyakanga ko azasohoka mu kazi ku munsi w'ivuka ye.</s>

en: The time has come to slow down, and sip maybe rooibos tea with my beloved wife in the afternoons" he said.
kin: Ati: "Igihe kirageze cyo gutinda, kandi tunywa icyayi cya rooibos hamwe n'umugore wanjye nkunda nyuma ya saa sita".
mt0: <pad> Igihe kirageze cyo gufata umwanya wo gutekereza, no kunywa tea ya rooibos n'umugore wanjye w'umwiza mu gitondo" yavuze.</s>

en: Tutu rose through the ranks of the Anglican church in South Africa to become the first black Anglican archbishop of Capetown.
kin: Tutu yazamutse mu ntera mu itorero ry'Abangilikani muri Afurika y'Epfo aba umwepiskopi wa mbere w’abirabura wa Anglican wa Capetown.
mt0: <pad> Tutu yaje mu rwego rw'itorero Anglican muri Afurika y'Epfo kugira ngo abe umuepiskopi wa mbere w'Umunyakenya uri umunyamahanga w'umubatizo wa Capetown.</s>

en: He was a vocal critic of South Africa's white-ruled government and encouraged non-violence to end apartheid.
kin: Yamaganaga cyane guverinoma iyobowe n’abazungu kandi ashishikariza kurwanya ihohoterwa no kurangiza ivangura.
mt0: <pad> Yagize icyo avuga ku butegetsi bw'abazungu muri Afurika y'Epfo, kandi yashishikarizaga ko abantu bakoresha ubutwari mu gukuraho apartheid.</s>

en: Tutu was the recipient of many awards, and in 1984, he received a Nobel Peace Prize for advocating "a democratic and just society without racial divisions.
kin: "Tutu ni we wahawe ibihembo byinshi, maze mu 1984, ahabwa igihembo cy’amahoro cyitiriwe Nobel kubera ko yashyigikiye "sosiyete ishingiye kuri demokarasi kandi itabera idafite amacakubiri ashingiye ku moko."
mt0: <pad> Tutu yahawe ibikombe byinshi, kandi mu 1984 yahawe igihembo cya Nobeli cy'amahoro kubera guharanira "umuco wa demokarasi no gukiranuka w'abaturage batari baziranenge."</s>

en: " He used the recognition to step up the anti-apartheid campaign, calling for an economic boycott against South Africa.
kin: Yakoresheje uburyo bwo kumenyekanisha n'ingufu igikorwa cyo kurwanya ivanguramoko, asaba kwamagana ibangamirwa ry'ubukungu muri Afurika y'Epfo.
mt0: <pad> Yakoresheje icyo kimenyetso mu gushishikariza intambara ya anti-apartheid, asaba ko ubutunzi bwa South Africa bugomba guhagarikwa.</s>

en: After the end of apartheid, Tutu called it an incredible day when Nelson Mandela won South Africa's first all-race elections.
kin: Nyuma y'ivangura rya apartheid, Tutu yavuze ko ari umunsi udasanzwe ubwo Nelson Mandela yatsindaga amatora ya mbere yo muri Afurika y'Epfo.
mt0: <pad> Nyuma y'uko apartheid yarangiye, Tutu yavuze ko ari umunsi w'akateye Nelson Mandela gutsinda amatora ya mbere y'abantu b'ubwoko bwose muri Afurika y'Epfo.</s>

en: "I would say the highest point for me was when I stood on the balcony in 1994 to introduce our new, brand new president to South Africa and the world," he said.
kin: Ati: "Navuga ko ingingo isumba izindi kuri njye ari igihe nahagararaga kuri ruhimbi mu 1994 kugira ngo menyekanishe perezida mushya, mushya muri Afurika y'Epfo no ku isi".
mt0: <pad> "Ndibaza ko igice kinini cyane kuri njy cyari igihe nahagaze ku muryango mu 1994 kugira ngo nshimishe umukuru w'igihugu wacu mushya, ushya, muri Afurika y'Epfo n'isi yose," yagize ati: "Iyo ni yo minsi ikomeye cyane kuri njy.</s>

en: To help mend the nation, President Mandela appointed Tutu as head of the country's Truth and Reconciliation Commission.
kin: Mu rwego rwo gufasha igihugu, Perezida Mandela yashyizeho Tutu nk'umuyobozi wa komisiyo ishinzwe ukuri n'ubwiyunge mu gihugu.
mt0: <pad> Kugira ngo ahindure igihugu, Perezida Mandela yashyize Tutu ku mwanya wa Komisiyo y'Ihame n'Imihoza y'Igihugu.</s>

en: The group issued a report that included numerous confessions of guilt under apartheid in return for amnesty.
kin: Itsinda ryasohoye raporo ikubiyemo kwatura ibyaha byinshi muri apartheid n'itangwa ry' imbabazi.
mt0: <pad> Ayo mashirahamwe yasohoye raporo igaragaza ko hari abagize uruhare mu guhamya ubutwari muri apartheid kugira ngo bafashwe amahirwe yo gutanga imbabazi.</s>

en: "It makes specific proposals on how we can cultivate a culture of human rights and of structures to insure that the atrocities of the past will not reoccur," Tutu said.Tutu also campaigned to fight poverty and AIDS.
kin: Tutu yagize ati: "Itanga ibitekerezo byihariye ku buryo dushobora kwimakaza umuco w'uburenganzira bwa muntu n'inzego kugira ngo twizere ko amarorerwa yo mu bihe byashize atazongera kubaho."
mt0: <pad> "Iyi raporo igaragaza uburyo bwo gukubita umuco w'uburenganzira bw'abantu no gushyiraho inzego kugira ngo urupfu rw'ahazaza ntirusubire," Tutu said.Tutu also campaigned to fight poverty and AIDS.</s>

en: In recent years, he expressed his disappointment in post-apartheid South Africa, especially the level of violent crime.
kin: Mu myaka yashize, yagaragaje ko atishimiye muri Afurika y'Epfo nyuma ya apartheid, cyane cyane urwego rw'ibyaha by'urugomo.
mt0: <pad> Mu myaka ishize, yagaragaje uburyo bubabaje muri Afurika y'Epfo nyuma ya apartheid, cyane cyane kubera urugero rw'ibyaha bikomeye.</s>

en: Despite his withdrawal from public life, Tutu says he will continue to support his peace foundation and will remain part of a group of elder statesmen who campaign for peace and human rights.
kin: N'ubwo yavuye mu buzima rusange, Tutu avuga ko azakomeza gushyigikira umusingi w’amahoro kandi ko azakomeza kuba mu itsinda ry’abasaza bakuru baharanira amahoro n’uburenganzira bwa muntu.
mt0: <pad> Despite his withdrawal from public life, Tutu says he will continue to support his peace foundation and will remain part of a group of elder statemen who campaign for peace and human rights.</s>

en: But Tutu says he will no longer give interviews and, as he put it, will mostly "shut up."
kin: Ariko Tutu avuga ko atazongera gutanga ibiganiro kandi nk'uko yabivuze, ahanini "azaceceka."
mt0: <pad> Tutu says he will no longer give interviews and, as he put it, will mostly "shut up."</s>

en: "I have been part of our struggle for freedom and democracy, and I am part of the celebration that we did succeed," he said. "I have been part of the post apartheid dispensation and long for us to do infinitely better."Many say his voice will be missed.
kin: Ati: "Nagize uruhare mu rugamba rwo guharanira ubwisanzure na demokarasi, kandi ndi mu birori ko twatsinze". Nagize uruhare mu ivangura rya apartheid kandi ndifuza ko dukora neza bitagira akagero. Benshi bavuga ko ijwi rye ritazabura.
mt0: <pad> "Ndi umwe mu bagize intambara yacu yo guharanira uburenganzira n'ubwigenge, kandi ni umwe mu bishima ko twageze aho twageze," yagize ati: "Ndi umwe mu bagize ubuyobozi bwa post-apartheid kandi nzifuza ko twarushaho kubikora neza cyane."</s>

en: Malawi's Jacaranda School for Orphans Celebrates Christmas
kin: Ishuri Jacaranda rya Malawi ry’imfubyi ririzihiza Noheri
mt0: <pad> Malawi's Jacaranda School for Orphans Celebrates Christmas</s>

en: The management for the Jacaranda School for Orphans in Malawis commercial capital Blantyre recently hosted a party for its students as it closed for Christmas and New Years Day holidays.
kin: Ubuyobozi bw'ishuri rya Jacaranda ry'impfubyi mu murwa mukuru w'ubucuruzi wa Malawis Blantyre riherutse gukora ibirori ku banyeshuri baryo kuko ryizihije iminsi mikuru ya Noheri n'Ubunani.
mt0: <pad> Abayobozi b'ishuri rya Jacaranda ry'abapfakazi mu murwa mukuru wa Blantyre muri Malawi batanze ubutumire ku banyeshuri ubwo ryari ryafunze ku munsi w'icyumweru cya Noheli na Nyakanga.</s>

en: Around 500 people including students, staff members and others from surrounding areas attended the event, which was held at the schools premises in Chigumula area.
kin: Abantu bagera kuri 500 barimo abanyeshuri, abakozi ndetse n’abandi baturutse mu turere tuhakikije bitabiriye ibirori byabereye mu bigo by’amashuri mu gace ka Chigumula.
mt0: <pad> About 500 people including students, staff members and others from the surrounding areas attended the event, which was held at the school premises in Chigumula area.</s>

en: The party included gifts, Santa Claus, and a "dancing show case" by the students.
kin: Muri ibyo birori harimo impano, Santa Claus n'imbyino by'abanyeshuri.
mt0: <pad> Hari impano, Santa Claus, n' "umukino w'amagambo" w'abanyeshuri.</s>

en: The school management told VOA that the yearly celebration has been a school tradition for the past 13years.
kin: Ubuyobozi bw'ishuri bwatangarije VOA ko kwizihiza isabukuru buri mwaka byabaye umuco w'ishuri mumyaka 13 ishize.
mt0: <pad> Abayobozi b'ishuri bavuganye na VOA ko ibirori bya buri mwaka bimaze imyaka 13 biba umuco w'ishuri.</s>

en: The school's director, Luc Deschamps, said: "[We feel] it is very important for us to celebrate Christmas because the children do not have parents.
kin: Umuyobozi w'iryo shuri, Luc Deschamps, yagize ati: "[Twumva] ari ngombwa kuri twe kwizihiza Noheri kuko abana badafite ababyeyi.
mt0: <pad> Luc Deschamps, umuyobozi w'ishuri, yagize ati: "[Twizeye] ko ari ngombwa kugira icyumweru cya Noheli kuko abana batagira abavyeyi.</s>

en: They stay with either a grandmother or a distant aunt or uncle, and they are not able to cerebrate at home or have a party or a little bit of sweets and cake for the children.
kin: Bagumana na nyirakuru, nyirasenge cyangwa nyirarume kandi ntibashobora guterana mu rugo cyangwa kugira ibirori cyangwa akantu gato karyoshye hamwe na keke ku bana.
mt0: <pad> Bagirukana na nyina cyangwa sekuru cyangwa sewabo, kandi ntibashobora gufata umwanya wo gutekereza mu rugo cyangwa gukora ibirori cyangwa kugira gatoya n'ishushu y'abana.</s>

en: So, we provide a happy day for the children to celebrate the spirit of Christmas. And it is also a way of our children to learn to give."
kin: Rero, dukora umunsi mwiza ku bana twizihiza Noheri. Kandi ni n'inzira yo gutuma abana bacu biiga gutanga. "
mt0: <pad> So, twereka umwanya w'ibyishimo ku bana bacu kugira ngo bashimishwa umuco wa Noheli. Kandi ni na bwo buryo bwiza abana bacu bashobora kwiga gutanga.</s>

en: No media source currently available

en: Deschamps, who is also an Honorary Consul of France in Malawi, said before the main event the patrons were treated to "a nice meal" from the students.
kin: Deschamps, akaba kandi ari n'Umujyanama w’icyubahiro w’Ubufaransa muri Malawi, yavuze ko mbere y’ibirori nyamukuru abo bagenzuzi bahawe "ifunguro ryiza" n’abanyeshuri.
mt0: <pad> Deschamps, uwari uhagarariye Konsula Nshingwabikorwa wa France muri Malawi, yavuze ko mbere y'uko ibirori by'ingenzi byagendaga, abafata imodoka bafunguwe "n'amafunguro meza" n'abanyeshuri b'i Kigali.</s>

en: "We had a big, big lunch with good meat and rice,[the dish made from maize flour called] nsima, of course, and vegetables.
kin: Yagize ati: "Twabonye ifunguro rya saa sita rihagije kandi rifite inyama n'umuceri mwiza, [ifunguro rikozwe mu ifu y'ibigori yitwa] nsima, ndetse n'imboga.
mt0: <pad> "Twafunguye ibirori byinshi, byinshi mu gitondo, hari amata n'ifunguro rya nsima, ndetse n'imboga.</s>

en: And it was the students themselves who cooked the meal for everybody, for over 500 people," he said.
kin: Kandi abanyeshuri ubwabo ni bo bariteguriye buri wese, ku bantu barenga 500.
mt0: <pad> Kandi ni abanyeshuri bwite bateguraga ibyokurya byose, ku bantu barenga 500," yagize ati: "</s>

en: One of the students, Eddah Zimba, said, "The celebrations are really cool, ... I have enjoyed myself. I have eaten, and now I am here dancing.
kin: Umwe mu banyeshuri, Eddah Zimba, yagize ati: "Ibirori ni byiza rwose, ... ubwange nishimye. Nariye, none ndimo no kubyina.
mt0: <pad> Umwe mu banyashuri, Eddah Zimba, yagize ati: "Ubuzima bwanjye burameze neza cyane,... naje, kandi ubu ndi hano ndagutse.</s>

en: What has interested me most is the gift that we have received the like the puffs, the biscuits, the squash and the dance."
kin: Icyanshimishije cyane ni impano twahawe zirimo nk'ibi puffs, ibisuguti, amashu n'imbyino. "
mt0: <pad> Ibyo nkunda cyane ni ibihe byawe, nk'ibyo puffs, biscuits, squash na dance.</s>

en: She thanked the schools management for hosting the Christmas party for students who in most cases do not have such celebrations at home.
kin: Yashimiye ubuyobozi bw'amashuri kuba bwaremeye gukora ibirori bya Noheri ku banyeshuri usanga akenshi badafite ibirori nk'ibi mu rugo.
mt0: <pad> She thanked the schools management for hosting the Christmas party for students who in most cases do not have such celebrations at home.</s>

en: Another student Emmanuel Chisale said good meal aside, the event has taught him the spirit of sharing.
kin: Undi munyeshuri Emmanuel Chisale yavuze ifunguro ryiza ku ruhande rwe, ibirori byamwigishije umuco wo gusangira.
mt0: <pad> Emmanuel Chisale, another student, said the event has taught him the spirit of sharing.</s>

en: "This party has brought a change in my life. I have learned that we have to have a heart for sharing one another as the Father Christmas was doing," he said.
kin: Ati: "Ibi biroro byazanye impinduka mu buzima bwanjye. Namenye ko tugomba kugira umutima wo gusangira nk'uko Papa Noheri yabikoraga".
mt0: <pad> "Iyi nzu yahinduye ubuzima bwanjye. Namenye ko tugomba kugira umutima wo gusangiza nk'uko Papa Noheli yari agishakira," yagize ati: "</s>

en: Founded in 2002, the Jacaranda School for Orphans is the only one in Malawi which provides free primary, secondary and tertiary education to children without parents.
kin: Ishuri ry'imfubyi rya Jacaranda ryashinzwe mu 2002, rikaba ari ryo ryonyine muri Malawi ritanga uburezi bw'amashuri abanza, ayisumbuye na kaminuza ku buntu ku bana badafite ababyeyi.
mt0: <pad> Inyubako yashinzwe mu 2002, Ishuri rya Jacaranda ry'Abana b'Abapfakazi niryo rimwe muri Malawi ritanga uburezi bwa mbere, bwo hagati no bwo hejuru ku bana bafite ababyeyi.</s>

en: A Malawian woman, Marie Da Silva, started the school after she returned from the United States where she spent nineteen years working as a nanny.
kin: Umugore wo muri Malawi, Marie Da Silva, yatangije ishuri nyuma yo kuva muri Amerika aho yari amaze imyaka cumi n'icyenda akora akazi ko kurera.
mt0: <pad> Akazi ka Malawi, Marie Da Silva, yashinze ishuri nyuma yo gusubira muri Amerika aho yamaze imyaka cumi n'icyenda akora akazi ko gutoza.</s>

en: "In 2022, it's really undeniable that media polarization and information chaos are really fueling social divisions in ways that are pretty new," said Clayton Weimers, deputy director of RSF for the United States, told VOA.
kin: Umuyobozi wungirije wa RSF muri Leta Zunze ubumwe za Amerika, Clayton Weimers, yabwiye ibiro ntaramakuru by'Abanyamerika ati: "Mu 2022, ntawahakana ko kuba itangazamakuru rikabije ndetse n'akajagari mu makuru bitera amacakubiri mu mibereho mu buryo bushya."
mt0: <pad> "Muri 2022, ni nk'aho bidashoboka ko ibitangazamakuru bifite uruhande runaka ndetse n'ibibazo by'amakuru bigishanya mu buryo bushya," Clayton Weimers, umuyobozi mukuru wa RSF muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yabwiye VOA.</s>

en: He said the prevalence of partisan news around the world has come at the expense of authentic journalism.
kin: Yavuze ko ubwamamare bw'amakuru y'amashyaka ku isi bwazanywe no gutangaza amakuru nyayo.
mt0: <pad> Avuga ko ikoreshwa ry'amakuru y'ingenzi mu gihugu cyose ryagize ingaruka mbi ku itangazamakuru nyawe.</s>

en: The group's annual report ranks 180 countries based on the environment for independent journalism.
kin: Raporo ngarukamwaka y'itsinda rishyira ku rutonde ibihugu 180 bishingiye ku itangazamakuru ryigenga.
mt0: <pad> Raporo y'uyu mwaka y'iki kigo ikurikiranya ibihugu 180 ku bijyanye n'uburyo bwo gukora ubutegetsi bufite umutekano.</s>

en: This year, however, RSF said it used a new method that blends each country's political, legal, economic, sociocultural and security conditions.
kin: Uyu mwaka ariko, RSF yavuze ko yakoresheje uburyo bushya buhuza buri gihugu mu buryo bwa politiki, amategeko, ubukungu, umuco ndetse n’umutekano.
mt0: <pad> Iyi mwaka, RSF yavuze ko yakoresheje uburyo bushya bufatiye ku bibazo by'ubutegetsi, amategeko, ubukungu, imibereho myiza n'umutekano w'igihugu.</s>

en: Now, the index classifies a record 28 countries as "having very bad media freedom."
kin: Noneho, urutonde rwerekana ibihugu 28 "bifite umudendezo mubi w'itangazamakuru."
mt0: <pad> Nyuma y'ibi, igipimo cyashyize mu majwi ibihugu 28 bya mbere ku rutonde rw'ibihugu "bifite uburenganzira buke bw'itangazamakuru."</s>

en: That group includes China, which is exporting censorship beyond its borders while also amplifying the Kremlin's propaganda on Russia's devastating war against Ukraine.
kin: Iri tsinda ririmo Ubushinwa, bwohereza ibicuruzwa hanze y’umupaka ndetse bikanashimangira poropagande ya Kremle ku ntambara ibabaje y’Uburusiya na Ukraine.
mt0: <pad> Ayo mashirahamwe arimo Ubushinwa, ariho itangaza censorship hanze y'imipaka yacyo kandi ikaba iriko ikwirakwiza propaganda ya Kremlin ku ntambara ikomeye y'uburusiya kuri Ukraine.</s>

en: Russia, China among worst
kin: Uburusiya, Ubushinwa mu bibi cyane
mt0: <pad> Russia, China among worst</s>

en: Since its invasion of Ukraine on February 24, Russia has sought total control over news coverage, passing a new law that carries 15-year prison terms for reporting "false news" on the military, and even forbids calling the conflict a "war."
kin: Kuva igitero cyagabwa muri Ukraine ku ya 24 Gashyantare, Uburusiya bwashatse kugenzura amakuru yose, butora itegeko rishya rigena igifungo cy’imyaka 15 kubera itangazwa "ry'amakuru y'ibinyoma" ku gisirikare, ndetse rikabuza kuvuga ko amakimbirane ari "intambara."
mt0: <pad> Kuva igihugu cya Russia cyinjiye muri Ukraine ku wa 24 Gashyantare, icyo gihugu cyafashe intwaro mu burasirazuba bwa Ukraine, kimaze gushyiraho amategeko mashya akurikirana abantu bavuga "amakuru atari yo" kuri ubwato, kandi kimwe no gukubita abantu bashinjwa gutanga "amakuru atari yo" kuri ubwato.</s>

en: That has forced most remaining independent news outlets, including the renowned Novaya Gazeta newspaper, Ekho Moskvy radio and Dozhd TV, to shut down or move outside Russia to continue operating.
kin: Ibyo bikaba byaratumye ibitangazamakuru byinshi byigenga bisigaye, birimo ikinyamakuru kizwi cyane cya Novaya Gazeta, radiyo Ekho Moskvy na TV ya Dozhd, bihagarika cyangwa byimukira mu Burusiya kugira ngo bikomeze gukora.
mt0: <pad> Ibyo byabujije ibigo by'amakuru bitandukanye, harimo ikinyamakuru kizwi cyane Novaya Gazeta, radiyo Ekho Moskvy na televiziyo Dozhd TV, gufungwa cyangwa kwimukira hanze y'u Burayi kugira ngo gukomeza gukora.</s>

en: With independent voices absent, experts say, the Russian government has been able to flood state-run airwaves with propaganda that downplays the war and spreads false or misleading justifications for the Kremlin's invasion.
kin: Impuguke zivuga ko mu gihe amajwi yigenga adahari, guverinoma y’Uburusiya yashoboye gukwiza amakuru ya leta hamwe na poropagande yerekana intambara kandi ikwirakwiza impamvu z’ibinyoma cyangwa zibeshya ku gitero cya Kremle.
mt0: <pad> Bye bye Russia, says the Russian government.</s>

en: Russia's media repression stands at 155 out of 180 countries included in RSF's index, where one is the most free and 180 the least.
kin: Ihohoterwa ry’itangazamakuru ry’Uburusiya rihagaze ku bihugu 155 mu bihugu 180 byashyizwe ku rutonde rwa RSF, aho kimwe ari cyo kiba gifite ubwisanzure kandi 180 bikaba bifite ubwisanzure buke.
mt0: <pad> Rwisi ihagaze ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gukubita ibitangazamakuru byo muri 155 mu bihugu 180 biri muri RSF, aho umwe ari wo ufite uburenganzira bwo gutanga ibitekerezo no kurusha abandi, naho 180 ni zo zifite uburenganzira buke.</s>

en: "It's safe to say at this point that the free press is a thing of the past in Russia," Clayton said.
kin: Clayton ati: "Ni byiza kuvuga kuri ubu ko itangazamakuru ryigenga ari ikintu cyahise mu Burusiya."
mt0: <pad> "Ubu ntabwo umuntu ushobora kuvuga ko itangazamakuru rifunguye ari ikintu cyabaye amateka muri Ruguru," Clayton yavuze.</s>

en: Throughout Russian President Vladimir Putin's 22 years in power, Moscow has been targeting journalists and the independent press, he said.
kin: Yavuze ko mu myaka 22 Perezida w’Uburusiya Vladimir Putin amaze ku butegetsi, Moscou yibasiye abanyamakuru n’ibitangazamakuru byigenga.
mt0: <pad> Mu myaka 22 ishize, mu gihe cya Perezida wa Russia Vladimir Putin yari ku butegetsi, Moscow yagiye ireba abanyamakuru n'itangazamakuru ritanga amakuru, nk'uko byavuzwe, ati: "Mu gihe cyose cy'imyaka 22 amaze ku butegetsi, Moscow yagiye ireba abanyamakuru n'itangazamakuru ritanga amakuru."</s>

en: "But since the invasion of Ukraine, it seems that Putin has really finished off the independent media once and for all in Russia," Clayton said. "At this point, it is impossible to accurately report on the war in Ukraine."
kin: Clayton ati: "Ariko kuva Ukraine yaterwa, birasa nkaho Putin yarangije itangazamakuru ryigenga rimwe na rimwe mu Burusiya." Kugeza ubu, ntibishoboka gutanga raporo neza ku ntambara ibera muri Ukraine.
mt0: <pad> "Ariko kuva muri Ukraine, nk'uko bigaragara ko Putin yarangije ibitangazamakuru byigenga mu Burusiya," Clayton said. "Iyi ni iminsi ntabwo ushobora kuvuga neza uko intambara y'i Ukraine ihagaze."</s>

en: China ranked 175th in the new report. And now that it is firmly under Beijing's influence, Hong Kong also registered a dramatic decline, ranking 148th out of 180 following a lengthy series of raids and arrests that shuttered pro-democracy news sites.
kin: Ubushinwa bwashyizwe ku mwanya wa 175 muri raporo nshya. Noneho, kubera ko iyobowe na Beijing, Hong Kong na yo yagabanutse ku buryo bugaragara, iza ku mwanya wa 148 kuri 180 nyuma y’igitero kinini n’ifatwa byafunze imbuga za interineti zishyigikira demokarasi.
mt0: <pad> China ranked 175th in the new report. And now that it is firmly under Beijing's influence, Hong Kong also registered a dramatic decline, ranking 148th out of 180 after a series of raids and arrests that shuttered pro-democracy news sites that were shut down by the Chinese government.</s>

en: RSF's country file on China says it is the world's biggest jailer of journalists, with 120 in detention. The regime uses coercion, harassment, intimidation and surveillance to keep independent and foreign journalists from reporting on issues deemed "sensitive."
kin: Idosiye ya RSF mu gihugu cy’Ubushinwa ivuga ko ari ho hari ifungwa ry’abanyamakuru benshi ku isi, 120 barafashwe. Ubutegetsi bukoresha agahato, gutotezwa, iterabwoba no kugenzura kugira ngo abanyamakuru bigenga ndetse n’abanyamahanga badatanga amakuru ku bibazo bifatwa nk’ibikomeye.
mt0: <pad> RSF's country file on China says it is the biggest jailer of journalists, with 120 in detention. The regime uses coercion, harassment, intimidation and surveillance to keep independent and foreign journalists from reporting on issues deemed "sensitive."</s>

en: "President Xi Jinping, in power since 2013, has restored a media culture worthy of the Maoist era, in which freely accessing information has become a crime and to provide information an even greater crime," RSF's country file states.
kin: Perezida Xi Jinping, wagiye ku butegetsi kuva mu 2013, yagaruye umuco w'itangazamakuru ukwiye, mu gihe cya Maoist ho, aho kubona amakuru ku bwisanzure byabaye icyaha no gutanga amakuru bikaba icyaha gikomeye kurushaho.
mt0: <pad> Perezida Xi Jinping, utegeka kuva muri 2013, yagaruye umuco w'itangazamakuru nk'uwa Maoist, aho kugerageza gufata amakuru byaba icyaha kandi gutanga amakuru bikaba icyaha gikomeye cyane," RSF's country file states.</s>

en: Rising authoritarianism
kin: Kwiyongera k'ubutegetsi bw'igitugu
mt0: <pad> Rising authoritarianism</s>

en: North Korea remains the worst country in the rankings at 180th. Elsewhere in the Asia-Pacific region, political turmoil, conflict and rising authoritarianism have wiped out years of progress.
kin: Koreya ya ruguru ikomeje kuba igihugu kibi ku rutonde kikaba icya 180. Ahandi hose mu karere ka Aziya-Pasifika, imvururu za politiki, amakimbirane hamwe n’ubutegetsi bw'igitugu byiyongereye byahanaguyeho iterambere.
mt0: <pad> Koreya ya Ruguru iracyari igihugu kibi cyane mu mibare, ku mwanya wa 180. Mu bindi bihugu byo muri Afurika y'Amajyepfo, imvururu za politiki, intambara n'ubutegetsi bukomeje gukuraho imyaka myinshi y'iterambere.</s>

en: The 2021 coup in Myanmar marked a 10-year setback for media rights, with journalists detained, media licenses revoked, and many news outlets returning to exile.
kin: Ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi bwo mu 2021 muri Miyanimari ryagaragaje ko hasubijwe imyaka 10 uburenganzira bw’itangazamakuru, abanyamakuru barafungwa, impushya z’itangazamakuru zivanwaho, ndetse n’ibitangazamakuru byinshi bisubira mu buhungiro.
mt0: <pad> 2021 coup in Myanmar marked a 10-year setback for media rights, with journalists detained, media licenses revoked, and many news outlets returning to exile.</s>

en: Under the military junta, Myanmar, ranking 176th, is one of the world's biggest jailers of journalists.
kin: Ku butegetsi bwa gisirikare, Miyanimari iri ku mwanya wa 176, ni hamwe mu hafunze abanyamakuru bakomeye ku isi.
mt0: <pad> Under the military junta, Myanmar, ranking 176th, is one of the world's biggest jailers of journalists.</s>

en: In Afghanistan, the Taliban insurgents pledged to uphold press freedom when they took power in August 2021.
kin: Muri Afuganisitani, inyeshyamba z’abatalibani ziyemeje guharanira ubwisanzure bw’itangazamakuru igihe zabafatiye ku butegetsi muri Kanama 2021.
mt0: <pad> In Afghanistan, the Taliban insurgents promised to uphold press freedom when they took power in August 2021.</s>

en: Instead, RSF said the "Taliban's seizure of power has further worsened conditions for reporters and news organizations, who are the targets of all forms of intimidation and violence." Afghanistan ranked 154th.
kin: Nyamara, RSF yavuze ko "kwigarurira ubutegetsi bw’abatalibani byarushijeho kuba bibi ku banyamakuru n’imiryango itangaza amakuru, bakaba ari bo bakorerwa iterabwoba n’urugomo." Afuganisitani iri ku mwanya wa 154.
mt0: <pad> Ntabwo RSF yavuze ko "ukwikura kwa Taliban ku butegetsi byagize ingaruka mbi ku bamenyeshamakuru n'ibigo byamakuru, bikaba bifite ibikoresho by'ihungabana n'iterabwoba."</s>

en: Across Africa, laws criminalizing online journalism have dealt a new blow to the right to information, RSF said, while the spread of rumors, propaganda, and disinformation has contributed to undermine access to quality information.
kin: RSF yavuze ko hirya no hino muri Afurika, amategeko ahana itangazamakuru ku rubuga rwa interineti yagize ingaruka nshya ku burenganzira bwo kumenya amakuru, mu gihe ikwirakwizwa ry’ibihuha, poropagande, ndetse n’amakuru yanduye byagize uruhare mu guhungabanya amakuru meza.
mt0: <pad> Across Africa, laws criminalizing online journalism have dealt a new blow to the right to information, RSF said, while the spread of rumors, propaganda and disinformation has contributed to undermine access to quality information.</s>

en: In Ethiopia, the war in the Tigray region, with its communication blackouts and restricted access, were the main factors that placed the country 114 on the index.
kin: Muri Etiyopiya, intambara yo mu karere ka Tigray, hamwe n’itumanaho no kubuza kwinjirira amakuru, ni byo bintu nyamukuru byashyize igihugu ku rutonde rwa 114.
mt0: <pad> Mu gihugu cya Etiyopiya, intambara y'i Tigray, hamwe n'amahitamo y'umukoresha w'imbuga nkoranyambaga no gufatwa nk'umuntu utamenya, nizo mbogamizi zafashije gushyira igihugu ku mwanya wa 114 kuri iyi index.</s>

en: Neighboring Eritrea and Djibouti are far worse, ranking near the bottom at 179 and 164, respectively.
kin: Abaturanyi ba Eritereya na Djibouti ho ni bibi cyane, biza hafi ya 179 na 164.
mt0: <pad> Eritrea na Djibouti bikaba byibuze biri hasi cyane, ubwabyo bakurikirana ku mwanya wa 179 na 164.</s>

en: African media continue to struggle economically, RSF said it its accompanying analysis.
kin: Ibitangazamakuru byo muri Afurika bikomeje guhangana mu by’ubukungu, RSF yavuze ko isesengura rihari riherekeje.
mt0: <pad> Rwandan Society for the Promotion of Free Speech (RSF) said that African media continue to struggle economically, its accompanying analysis showed.</s>

en: "Despite a wave of liberalization in the 1990s, there are still, too often, cases of arbitrary censorship, especially on the internet, with occasional network shutdowns in some countries, arrests of journalists and violent attacks," the group said.
kin: Iri tsinda ryagize riti: "Nubwo mu myaka ya za 90 habaye umudendezo wo kwishyira ukizana, haracyari, kenshi na kenshi, ibibazo byo kugenzura uko bishakiye, cyane cyane kuri interineti, rimwe na rimwe bifunga imiyoboro mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe, ifatwa ry'abanyamakuru ndetse n'ibitero by'urugomo."
mt0: <pad> "Nubwo habayeho impinduka mu myaka ya 1990, hariho n'ubundi ibikorwa by'uburenganzira ku bumenyi bikoreshwa nabi, cyane cyane kuri interineti, aho rimwe na rimwe imihanda y'urubuga igafungwa, gufatwa kwa ba journalists n'iterabwoba," icyo kigo cyavugaga.</s>

en: Clayton said the rising authoritarianism feeds on itself.
kin: Clayton yavuze ko igitugu kigenda cyiyongera.
mt0: <pad> Clayton said authoritarianism rises by itself.</s>

en: "When we allow a culture of impunity to exist where authoritarians are allowed to go after journalists, harass them, arrest them, beat them in the streets and kill them, it has a knock-on effect," he said.
kin: Ati: "Iyo twemeye ko umuco wo kudahana ubaho aho abategetsi b'igitugu bemerewe gukurikirana abanyamakuru, kubatoteza, kubafata, kubakubita mu mihanda no kubica, bigira ingaruka mbi".
mt0: <pad> "Iyo dutanze umuco w'ihohoterwa uhari aho abagize ubutegetsi bakurikirana abanyamakuru, bagahungabana, bagafata, bagakubita mu mihanda no kubagirira nabi, bifite ingaruka zikomeye," yagize ati: "Ibintu byose biba na ingaruka zikomeye."</s>

en: "It emboldens that same authoritarian to do it again next time, and it emboldens other authoritarians who are watching to do the same."
kin: Irashimangira ubwo butegetsi bumwe bwo kuzongera kubikora ubutaha, kandi bugashimangira abandi bayobozi bareba ko babikora.
mt0: <pad> "Ibi byaremye uwo munyamakuru kugira ngo akore ibintu bimwe na bimwe n'abandi banyamakuru bari kureba kugira ngo bakore ibintu bimwe na bimwe."</s>

en: US not perfect
kin: Amerika ntabwo Ari intunganye
mt0: <pad> Niba ushaka gusubiza igitekerezo, vuga ko utamenya Amerika.</s>

en: After a period of seeing its media attacked as "fake news" by former President Donald Trump, the United States retained a relatively high ranking of 42 in RSF's index.
kin: Nyuma y'igihe kinini cyo kubona itangazamakuru ryacyo ryibasiwe "n'amakuru y'ibinyoma" n'uwahoze ari perezida Donald Trump, Amerika yagumanye umwanya wa 42 ukurikije urutonde rwa RSF.
mt0: <pad> Nyuma y'igihe gito cyo gukurikiranwa n'ubutegetsi bwa Donald Trump, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yagumanye urugero runaka rwiza muri RSF rwa 42, nyuma yo gukubita ibitangazamakuru byayo nk'ibinyoma.</s>

en: That is largely thanks to the return of regular White House and federal agency press briefings.
kin: Ibyo ahanini tubikesha kugaruka kwa White House bisanzwe hamwe n'abanyamakuru ba federasiyo.
mt0: <pad> Bye bye White House and federal agency press briefings.</s>

en: But RSF said problems persist, including "the disappearance of local newspapers, the systematic polarization of the media, and the erosion of journalism by digital platforms amid a climate of animosity and aggression toward journalists, among others."
kin: Ariko RSF yavuze ko ibibazo bikomeje, harimo "ibura ry'ibinyamakuru byaho, itumanaho rya buri gihe ry'itangazamakuru, ndetse no gutsemba abanyamakuru ku mbuga za interineti mu gihe hari inzangano n'ibitero byibasiye abanyamakuru, n'ibindi."
mt0: <pad> Ariko RSF yavuze ko ibibazo bikiriho, harimo "ukwibagirwa kw'ibinyamakuru bya mu gihugu, imikorere ya politiki y'ibitangazamakuru, no guhungabana kwayo kubera urubuga nkoranyamakuru rwa interineti rukuruye n'umuco w'ubugome n'iterabwoba ku banyamakuru, nk'uko biri mu raporo ya RSF."</s>

en: Barriers exist, for instance, when it comes to covering state governments and protests.
kin: Inzitizi zirahari, nk'urugero, mu gihe cyo gusigasira inzego za leta n’imyigaragambyo.
mt0: <pad> Hari imipaka, urugero, iyo bivuze ko gukurikirana leta z'ibihugu n'ibikorwa by'imyigaragambyo.</s>

en: "We typically find that this is either due to just a blatant disregard for the laws governing open records or meetings, or they're simply misinterpreting them.
kin: Umuyobozi mukuru w'ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe itangazamakuru, Beth Francesco ati: "Ubusanzwe dusanga ibyo biterwa no kwirengagiza byimazeyo amategeko agenga inyandiko zifunguye cyangwa inama, cyangwa se bakabisobanura nabi.
mt0: <pad> "Twavuga ko umuntu ashobora kuba ari uko ashaka kubangamira amategeko agenga ibitabo by'abaturage cyangwa inama, cyangwa se akaba ari uko abona ko ari uko abigisha babibona nabi.</s>

en: An individual is misinterpreting whether a journalist can be present at a particular event," said Beth Francesco, senior director of the National Press Club Journalism Institute.
kin: Umuntu ku giti cye arimo gusobanura nabi niba umunyamakuru ashobora kwitabira ibirori runaka."
mt0: <pad> Abantu bamwe ntibumva neza niba umunyamakuru ashobora kuba muri iryo seremo."</s>

en: A few bright spots
kin: Ahantu hakeye
mt0: <pad> Amwe nk'amashusho y'umucyo</s>

en: Despite an overall trend of decline, Clayton said there are positives.
kin: Nubwo muri rusange bigenda bigabanuka, Clayton yavuze ko hari ibyiza.
mt0: <pad> Ariko nubwo hari impinduka, Clayton yavuze ko hari ibintu byiza.</s>

en: Some governments provide funding for news media without interfering in their operations, to ensure independence from political influence.
kin: Guverinoma zimwe na zimwe zitanga inkunga mu bitangazamakuru zitivanze mu bikorwa byabyo, mu kugaragaza ubwigenge ko nta ruhare rwa politiki rurimo.
mt0: <pad> Amwe mu mategeko atanga inkunga ku bitangazamakuru nta gukurikirana ibikorwa byabo, kugira ngo birinde ko bifite ingaruka za politiki.</s>

en: "If you look at the top of our list, some of the things that stand out are these are countries that have robust public funding for media," he said, noting that "it's always important to separate state funding for media and state-controlled media."
kin: Ati: "Iyo urebye hejuru y'urutonde rwacu, bimwe mu bigaragara ni ibi bihugu bifite inkunga ya Leta mu itangazamakuru", akomeza agira ati: "Buri gihe ni ngombwa gutandukanya inkunga ya Leta mu bitangazamakuru no kugenzurwa na leta."
mt0: <pad> "Urebye urutonde rwacu, bimwe mu bintu bigaragaza ni ko ibihugu byinshi biri ku rutonde rw'ibihugu byawe byifuje cyane itangazamakuru," yagize ati: "Ibintu bitangaje ni ko hari ibihugu byifuje cyane itangazamakuru n'itangazamakuru riyobowe na leta."</s>

en: Three Scandinavian countries — Norway, Denmark and Sweden — respectively come at the top of RSF's index. Estonia, a former Soviet Union republic, ranked 4th.
kin: Ibihugu bitatu bya Scandinaviya - Noruveje, Danemarke na Suwede - biza ku isonga ku rutonde rwa RSF. Esitoniya yahoze ari repubulika y’Abasoviyeti, iri ku mwanya wa 4.
mt0: <pad> Nyamara, umuntu ashobora guhindura igitekerezo cye n'ibyo ashaka.</s>

en: RSF said the free exercise of journalism plays a major role in emerging democracies such as East Timor, ranked 17, Bhutan, ranked 33, and Mongolia, ranked 90.
kin: RSF yavuze ko itangazamakuru rikorera mu bwisanzure rigira uruhare runini muri demokarasi igaragara nka Timoru y’iburasirazuba, iri ku mwanya wa 17, Bhutani, 33, na Mongoliya iri ku mwanya wa 90.
mt0: <pad> RSF yavuze ko itangazamakuru rikora akazi gakomeye mu bihugu bya Afurika y'Epfo, cya 17, Bhutan, cya 33, na Mongoliya, cya 90.</s>

en: East Timor was one country whose ranking skyrocketed, rising 54 places. But RSF cautioned that because of its change in methodology this year, "care should be taken when comparing the 2022 rankings and scores with those from 2021."
kin: Iburasirazuba bwa Timoru ni igihugu kimwe cyashyizwe hejuru cyane, kizamuka ahantu 54. Ariko RSF yibukije ko kubera ihinduka ry’imikorere muri uyu mwaka, "hagomba kwitonderwa iyo ugereranije amanota 2022 n'amanota yo mu 2021."
mt0: <pad> East Timor ni kimwe mu bihugu byagize igice kinini cyane, yiyongereye ku mwanya 54. RSF yaburiye ko bitewe n'uko uburyo bwakoreshejwe muri uyu mwaka, "ugomba kwitonda igihe ugerageza guhuza ibipimo n'ibibazo bya 2022 n'ibyo wa 2021."</s>

en: UN’s Guterres Meets with Nigerian Leaders After Visiting Volatile Borno State
kin: Loni ya Guterres ihura n'abayobozi ba Nigeriya Nyuma yo gusura Leta ya Borno
mt0: <pad> UN's Guterres Meets with Nigerian Leaders After Visiting Volatile Borno State</s>

en: U.N. Secretary General Antonio Guterres met with Nigerian leaders Wednesday at the end of a two-day visit to Nigeria and three-nation trip to Africa.
kin: Ku wa gatatu, umunyamabanga mukuru wa Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika, Antonio Guterres yabonanye n’abayobozi ba Nijeriya nyuma y’uruzinduko rw’iminsi ibiri muri Nijeriya n’urugendo rw’ibihugu bitatu muri Afurika. Ku wa kabiri, yasuye abimuwe mu gihugu (IDP) mu majyaruguru y'uburasirazuba bwa Nijeriya maze abasaba ko basubizwa mu ngo zabo amahoro. Abategetsi ba Nijeriya barateganya gufunga inkambi zose z’abimuwe mu myaka mike iri imbere nubwo hari impungenge z'umutekano. Ku wa gatatu, Antonio Guterres yageze mu nzu y’umuryango w’abibumbye i Abuja ahura n’umuhuzabikorwa w’umuryango w’abibumbye mbere yo kugirana ibiganiro n’abahagarariye abagore bo muri Nijeriya.
mt0: <pad> U.N. Secretary General Antonio Guterres yahuriye n'abayobozi ba Nigeria ku wa gatatu mu mpera y'urugendo rwe rw'iminsi ibiri muri Nigeria no mu bihugu bitatu bya Afirika.</s>

en: The delegates, led by Nigeria's minister for womens affairs, Pauline Kedem Tallen, discussed gender equality and the inclusion of women in politics with the U.N. secretary-general.
kin: Izi ntumwa ziyobowe na minisitiri w’ibikorwa by’umugore muri Nijeriya, Pauline Kedem Tallen, baganiriye ku buringanire bw’umugore no kwinjiza abagore muri politiki n’umunyamabanga mukuru wa Amerika.
mt0: <pad> Abagize urukiko rw'Igihugu rw' Abagore, Pauline Kedem Tallen, minisitiri w'ubuzima muri Nigeria, baganiriye ku bumwe bw'igitsina no gushyira abagore mu matora n'umunyamabanga wa UN.</s>

en: "His coming to Nigeria today has given us hope, because we know that he will lend his voice to all the issues affecting women, gender-based violence, early marriage, lack of implementation of some of our laws," said Tallen.
kin: Tallen yagize ati: "Uyu munsi kuza muri Nijeriya byaduhaye ibyiringiro, kuko tuzi ko azatanga ijwi rye ku bibazo byose bireba abagore, ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina, gushyingirwa hakiri kare, kudashyira mu bikorwa amategeko yacu."
mt0: <pad> "Ubwo yaje muri Nigeria uyu munsi, turagira ibyiringiro, kuko tuzi ko azavuga icyo kibazo cyose gifitanye isano n'abagore, imibonano mpuzabitsina idahwitse, ubukwe bwa mbere, uko bimwe mu mategeko yacu bishyirwa mu bikorwa," Tallen told the BBC.</s>

en: Guterres afterwards met with Nigeria's religious leaders and later attended a wreath-laying ceremony at the U.N. house to remember the 23 people killed during the 2011 bombing of the building.
kin: Nyuma Guterres yahuye n’abayobozi b’amadini ya Nijeriya nyuma aza kwitabira umuhango wo gushyira indabyo mu nzu y’umuryango w’abibumbye kugira ngo bibuke abantu 23 bishwe n'igisasu cyaturikiye mu nyubako ya 2011.
mt0: <pad> Guterres yahise abona abagize ubwoko bw'abagize imana muri Nigeria, nyuma yaho ajya mu birori byo gushyira umudari ku nyubakwa y'Umuryango w'abibumbye kugira ngo yibutse abantu 23 bapfuye mu mwaka wa 2011 ubwo urupfu rw'iyo nyubakwa rwaturiwe.</s>

en: He began his three-nation Africa visit Sunday in Senegal as part of his Ramadan solidarity tour, and later went to Niger.
kin: Yatangiye uruzinduko rwe muri Afurika y'ibihugu bitatu ku cyumweru muri Senegali mu rwego rwo kuzenguruka ubumwe bwa Ramadhan, nyuma ajya muri Niger.
mt0: <pad> Yatanguriye urugendo rwe muri Afirika rw'ibihugu bitatu ku wa Mbere muri Senegal nk'igice cy'inzira y'ubufatanye ya Ramadan, nyuma agera muri Niger.</s>

en: On Tuesday, he visited northeastern Borno state and met with the state governor as well as IDPs and families impacted by the Boko Haram conflict.
kin: Ku wa kabiri, yasuye intara y’amajyaruguru ya Leta ya Borno maze abonana na guverineri w’intara hamwe n’abimuwe n’imiryango yibasiwe n’intambara ya Boko Haram.
mt0: <pad> Bye bye IDPs.</s>

en: Guterres also visited repentant Boko Haram fighters and praised authorities' reintegration program for more than 1,000 former fighters.
kin: Guterres kandi yasuye abarwanyi ba Boko Haram bihannye anashimira gahunda y’abategetsi bahoze mu barwanyi barenga 1.000.
mt0: <pad> Guterres visited repentant Boko Haram fighters and praised the government's reintegration program for more than 1,000 former fighters.</s>

en: He also commended authorities efforts to resettle displaced people back to their communities and called for more support to rebuild the region.
kin: Yashimye kandi ubuyobozi bwashyize ingufu mu gucyura abimuwe mu byabo kandi asaba ko hashyigikirwa kubaka izindi nyubako.
mt0: <pad> Ashimiye kandi ibikorwa by'ubutegetsi mu gutuza abahungabanyijwe mu bice byabo, asaba ubufasha bukomeye mu gusana icyo gice.</s>

en: "The Borno that I found today is the Borno of hope, the Borno with future and I was very impressed to see the policy that is being deployed here, recognizing that you don't fight terrorism just by military means, you fight terrorism addressing the root causes of terrorism," he said.
kin: Borno nasanze aha uyu munsi ni Borno y'ibyiringiro, Borno y'ejo hazaza kandi natangajwe cyane no kubona politiki iri gukoreshwa hano, nkamenya ko utarwanya iterabwoba ukoresheje inzira za gisirikare gusa, urwanya iterabwoba rivuga n'ntandaro y'iterabwoba.
mt0: <pad> "Iki gihe nari mu gihugu cya Borno ni icyo kizabaho, n'ahazaza kandi natunguwe cyane no kureba politiki yakoreshejwe hano, nzi ko ntabwo ubarwanya terrorisme gusa mu buryo bw'intambara, ahubwo ubarwanya terrorisme ugakurikirana intandaro za terrorisme," yavuze.</s>

en: "The people that I met today in the IDP camps want to go back home in safety and dignity.
kin: Abantu nahuye na bo uyu munsi mu nkambi z'abimuwe barashaka gusubira mu rugo mu mutekano no mu cyubahiro.
mt0: <pad> "Abantu nsuye uyu munsi mu bitaro bya IDP bashaka gusubira mu rugo mu mahoro no ku rwego rw'icubahiro.</s>

en: The way to address terrorism effectively is to provide not only hope but a future of reality."
kin: Inzira yo guhangana n’iterabwoba ni ugutanga ibyiringiro ndetse ahubwo ni ejo hazaza h'ukuri.
mt0: <pad> Inzira yo gufata ingamba nziza kubera iterabwoba ni gutanga icyizere gusa, ahubwo n'ahazaza ha nyaho.</s>

en: Nigerian authorities have been closing IDP camps since late last year and want to close all camps by 2026. More than 2 million people have been displaced from their homes since the start of the Boko Haram insurgency in 2009.
kin: Abategetsi ba Nijeriya bafunze ingando kuva mu mpera z'umwaka ushize kandi barashaka gufunga inkambi zose mu 2026. Abantu barenga miliyoni 2 bavanywe mu byabo kuva aho inyeshyamba za Boko Haram zitangiriye mu 2009.
mt0: <pad> Abayobozi ba Nigeria bamaze gufunga ahantu ha IDP kuva mu kwezi kwa karindwi gushize kandi bifuza gufunga hose muri 2026. Hafi 2 million abantu bamaze kwirukanwa mu byabo kuva Boko Haram yatangira intambara muri 2009.</s>

en: But aid groups have been warning some communities may still be attacked.
kin: Ariko amatsinda atabara yagiye aburira abaturage bamwe bashobora kugabwaho igitero.
mt0: <pad> Ariko ibigo by'ubutabazi bivuga ko hari ubwo bamwe mu midugudu ishobora kuba barakorewe ihohoterwa.</s>

en: "There are multiple solutions when it comes to resettlement. We need to get people stabilized," said Adenike Oladosu, a climate justice activist, met with the U.N. secretary-general.
kin: Adenike Oladosu, uharanira ubutabera mu by'ikirere, yabonanye n'umunyamabanga mukuru wa Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika ati: "Hariho ibisubizo byinshi mu bijyanye no gutuza. Tugomba gutuma abantu batekana."
mt0: <pad> "Hariho ibisubizo bitandukanye iyo uvuga ku gutabara. Tugomba gushyira abantu mu mahoro."</s>

en: "Climate change is leading to the rise of armed conflicts affecting people in the region and around and the need for us to see that we have more climate action and not always military action."
kin: Imihindagurikire y’ibihe ituma amakimbirane yitwaje intwaro yiyongera ku baturage bo mu karere ndetse no hirya no hino kandi dukeneye ko tubona ko dufite ibikorwa byinshi by’ikirere kandi ko atari ko buri gihe haba ibikorwa bya gisirikare.
mt0: <pad> "Ihinduka ry'ikirere ritera ubwiyongere bw'intambara z'ingabo mu gihugu no mu mahanga, kandi ni ngombwa ko tubona ko hariho ibikorwa byinshi by'ikirere kurusha ibikorwa by'intambara."</s>

en: The U.N. secretary-general ended his visit at the Abuja presidential village, where he met with President Muhammadu Buhari and his top Cabinet members.
kin: Umunyamabanga mukuru wa Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika yakoze uruzinduko rwe mu mudugudu wa perezida wa Abuja, aho yabonanye na Perezida Muhammadu Buhari n'abagize Guverinoma bakuru.
mt0: <pad> U.N. secretary-general ended his visit at the Abuja presidential village, where he met with President Muhammadu Buhari and his top Cabinet members.</s>

en: Al-Shabab Raids African Union Military Base
kin: Al-Shabab yagabye igitero ku kigo cya gisirikare cy’ubumwe bwa Afurika
mt0: <pad> Al-Shabab Raids African Union Military</s>

en: Al-Shabab fighters stormed an African Union military base in the village of El-Baraf in Somalias Middle Shabelle region early Tuesday, local officials and security sources say.
kin: Abayobozi b'inzego z'ibanze ndetse n'abashinzwe umutekano bavuga ko abarwanyi ba Al-Shabab bateye mu birindiro by'ingabo z’umuryango w’ubumwe bw’Afurika mu mudugudu wa El-Baraf mu karere ka Somaliya Hagati mu karere ka Shabelle.
mt0: <pad> Al-Shabab fighters stormed an African Union military base in the village of El-Baraf in Somalia's Middle Shabelle region early Tuesday, local officials and security sources say.</s>

en: Officials told VOA Somali that the militants briefly seized the base before withdrawing from it. State media said Burundian solders at the base repulsed the attack.
kin: Abayobozi babwiye VOA ikorera muri Somaliya ko abarwanashyaka bafashe ibirindiro mbere gato yo kubivamo. Ibitangazamakuru bya Leta byavuze ko abarwanyi bo mu Burundi bari mu kigo bashubije inyuma icyo gitero.
mt0: <pad> Abayobozi bavuga ko abarwanyi bafashe ikibanza mu gihe gito mbere yo kuva. Ibitangazamakuru by'igihugu bivuga ko abasirikare b'Uburundi bari ku kibanza barwanyaga icyo gitero.</s>

en: "The Federal Government of Somalia condemns in the strongest possible terms the heinous attack targeting the African Union Transition Mission in Somalia forward operating base in Elbaraf, Middle Shabelle," the Somali Ministry of Foreign Affairs posted on its official Facebook page.
kin: Minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga ya Somaliya yanditse ku rubuga rwayo rwa Facebook, igira iti: "Guverinoma y’igihugu cya Somaliya iramagana mu magambo akomeye bishoboka ko igitero kibi cyagabwe ku butumwa bw’inzibacyuho bw’umuryango w’ubumwe bw’Afurika Yunze ubumwe muri Somaliya i Elbaraf, hagati ya Shabelle."
mt0: <pad> "Ubutegetsi bw'igihugu bwa Somalia buravuga ko bumagana mu buryo bukomeye ibikorwa by'iterabwoba byibasiye ikigo cya AU cyo gutangira imirimo muri Somaliya, cyitwa Elbaraf, mu majyaruguru y'umugi wa Shabelle."</s>

en: "We extend our deepest condolences to the victims of this terrorist attack and their families."
kin: Twihanganishije cyane abahuye n'ingaruka n'iki gitero cy'iterabwoba n'imiryango yabo.
mt0: <pad> "Twizeye ko urupfu rw'abakorewe n'iterabwoba rwarahitanye abantu benshi cyane, kandi turavuga nti ubwo bugome bwabaye mu gihugu cyacu."</s>

en: The Mayor of El-Baraf, Abdullahi Haji Muhumed, said the militants started their attack with two suicide truck bombs. He said the militants then fought their way onto the base.
kin: Umuyobozi w'akarere ka El-Baraf, Abdullahi Haji Muhumed, yavuze ko aba barwanyi batangiye kugaba ibitero bakoresheje bisasu bibiri by'amakamyo. Yavuze ko abarwanashyaka bahise barwanira mu birindiro.
mt0: <pad> Umuyobozi w'Umujyi wa El-Baraf, Abdullahi Haji Muhumed, yavuze ko abarwanyi batangiye igitero cyabo n'imodoka zifite ibyuka zaturikiye.</s>

en: Al-Shabab claimed the killing of 173 African Union forces. The group also claimed responsibility for capturing AU forces as prisoners-of-war. Both claims could not be independently verified. AU force headquarters and Somali military officials could not be immediately reached for comment.
kin: Al-Shabab yatangaje ko hapfuye ingabo 173 z’umuryango w’ubumwe bw’Afurika. Uyu mutwe kandi wavuze ko ufite inshingano zo gufata ingabo za AU nk'imfungwa z'intambara. Ibyo birego byombi ntibishobora kugenzurwa mu bwigenge. Icyicaro gikuru cy’ingabo za AU hamwe n’abayobozi b’igisirikare cya Somaliya ntibashoboye guhita batanga ibisobanuro.
mt0: <pad> Al-Shabab yashinze urupfu rw'abasirikare ba AU 173. Iyi nzu y'ingabo kandi yashinze ko abasirikare ba AU bafashwe nk'imbohe z'intambara. Ibi byose ntibyashobokaga gukurikiranwa mu buryo bwemewe.</s>

en: In an interview with VOA, Muhumed, who was not at the village at the time of the attack, said he was told there were "many deaths" among Burundian forces but could not give an exact figure.
kin: Mu kiganiro yagiranye na VOA, Muhumed, utari mu mudugudu igihe igitero cyagabwaga, yavuze ko yabwiwe ko hari "imfu nyinshi" mu ngabo z’Uburundi ariko ko adashobora gutanga imibare nyayo.
mt0: <pad> Mu kiganiro na VOA, Muhumed, uwari ari mu mugi ubwo Burundi yakoreshaga ingabo zabwo, yavuze ko yabwiwe ko hari "abantu benshi" bapfuye muri uwo mutwe ariko nta rwego rwo kuvuga urwo rupfu.</s>

en: "Fighting like this never happened in this area," he said. "It was heavy fighting."
kin: Ati: "Imirwano nk'iyi ntabwo yigeze ibera muri kariya gace". Yari imirwano ikomeye.
mt0: <pad> "Intambara nk'iyo ntabwo yarigeze iba mu karere kacu," yagize ati: "Iri ni intambara ikomeye cyane."</s>

en: He said two civilians were also killed and more than 10 others injured.
kin: Yavuze ko abasivili babiri na bo bishwe abandi barenga 10 barakomereka.
mt0: <pad> Avuga ko n'abandi babiri b'abaturage bapfuye kandi barenga 10 bakomeretse.</s>

en: Muhumed confirmed to VOA that al-Shabab militants withdrew from the base. He also reported airstrikes targeting the militants as they left the base but did not say who was responsible for the strikes.
kin: Muhumed yemeje VOA ko abarwanyi ba al-Shabab bavuye mu birindiro. Yavuze kandi ko ibitero by’indege byibasiye abarwanashyaka ubwo bavaga mu birindiro ariko ntiyavuze uwagize uruhare muri ibyo bitero.
mt0: <pad> Muhumed yabwiye VOA ko al-Shabab yagendaga bava mu kigo. Yabwiye kandi ko hari ibitero by'indege byakorewe ku gitero ubwo abarwanyi bagendaga basohoka ariko ntabwo yavuze uwakoze ibitero.</s>

en: El-Baraf, approximately 150 kilometers north of Mogadishu, is one of the forward operating bases of African Union forces from Burundi.
kin: El-Baraf, nko mu birometero 150 mu majyaruguru ya Mogadishu, ni kimwe mu birindiro by'ingabo z’umuryango w’ubumwe bw’ibihugu by’Uburayi ziba mu Burundi.
mt0: <pad> El-Baraf, approximately 150 kilometers north of Mogadishu, is one of the forward operating bases of African Union forces from Burundi.</s>

en: The incident marked the first major al-Shabab attack on AU forces since the mission changed its name and operational structures last month.
kin: Iki cyabaye igitero cya mbere gikomeye al-Shabab yagabye ku ngabo za AU kuva ubwo butumwa bwahinduye izina n'imikorere yabyo mu kwezi gushize.
mt0: <pad> Iyi nkuru yagaragaje igitero cya mbere gikomeye cya al-Shabab ku birindiro bya AU kuva icyo kigo cyahinduye izina n'imiterere yacyo mu kwezi gushize.</s>

en: The U.N. Security Council, which authorized the new mission called the African Union Transition Mission in Somalia (ATMIS), gives it a mandate to reduce the threat posed by al-Shabab, support the capacity-building of Somali security forces, and conduct a phased handover of security responsibilities to Somalia. The mission has until the end of 2024 to operate in the country.
kin: Akanama k'umuryango w’abibumbye gashinzwe umutekano, kemereye ubutumwa bushya bwitwa Mission Union Transition Mission muri Somaliya (ATMIS), giha inshingano yo kugabanya iterabwoba ryatewe na al-Shabab, gushyigikira kongerera ubushobozi inzego z’umutekano za Somaliya. Hakozwe kandi ihererekanyabubasha ry’umutekano muri Somaliya. Inshingano ifite kugeza mu mpera za 2024 gukorera mu gihugu.
mt0: <pad> U.N. Security Council, which authorized the new mission called the African Union Transition Mission in Somalia (ATMIS), gives it a mandate to reduce the threat posed by al-Shabab, support the capacity-building of Somali security forces, and conduct a phased handover of security responsibilities to Somalia. The mission has until the end of 2024 to operate in the country.</s>

en: India’s Muslims Mark Eid al-Fitr Amid Community Violence
kin: Abayisilamu bo mu Buhinde bagize Eid al-Fitr mu gihe cy’ihohoterwa ry’abaturage
mt0: <pad> India’s Muslims Mark Eid al-Fitr Amid Community Violence</s>

en: Muslims across India marked Eid al-Fitr on Tuesday by offering prayers outside mosques, even as the celebrations this year came in the backdrop of a series of recent attacks against the community during the month of Ramadan.
kin: Ku wa kabiri, Abayisilamu bo mu Buhinde bizihije umunsi mukuru wa Eid al-Fitr basengera hanze y’imisigiti, nubwo kwizihiza uyu mwaka byaje nyuma y’ibitero byibasiye abaturage mu kwezi kwa Ramadhan.
mt0: <pad> Muslims across India marked Eid al-Fitr by offering prayers outside mosques, even as the celebrations this year came in the backdrop of a series of recent attacks against the community during the month of Ramadan.</s>

en: "We will not have the same kind of festivity" this time, said Mohammad Habeeb ur Rehman, a civil engineer in Indias financial capital, Mumbai. "This is the most painful Eid with worst memories for Indian Muslims."
kin: Mohammad Habeeb ur Rehman, umushakashatsi mu by'ubwubatsi mu murwa mukuru w'imari wa Indias, Mumbai, yagize ati: "Ntabwo tuzagira ibirori nk'ibyo." Uyu ni umunsi ukomeye ubabaza cyane twibuka abayisilamu bo mu Buhinde.
mt0: <pad> "Ibi biratuma nta mugoroba wa Eid uzaba nk'undi uyu mwaka," said Mohammad Habeeb ur Rehman, a civil engineer in India's capital Mumbai. "Ibi ni ibihe byababaje cyane kurusha ibindi byo muri iyi Eid, n'ibihe bibi cyane kurusha ibindi byo muri iyi Eid kubera ko abantu benshi batari bashobora kwishimira ibyo bakora."</s>

en: Anti-Muslim sentiment and attacks have surged across the country in the last month, including stone throwing between Hindu and Muslim groups during religious processions and subsequent demolitions of a number of properties mostly belonging to Muslims by authorities.
kin: Mu kwezi gushize imyumvire yo kurwanya abayisilamu n'ibitero byagaragaye hirya no hino mu gihugu, harimo gutera amabuye hagati y'amatsinda y'abahindu n'abayisilamu mu gihe cy'imyigaragambyo y'idini ndetse no gusenya imitungo myinshi ahanini yari iy'abayisilamu n'abayobozi.
mt0: <pad> Anti-Muslim sentiment and attacks have surged across the country in the last month, including stone throwing between Hindu and Muslim groups during religious processions and subsequent demolitions of a number of properties mostly belonging to Muslims by authorities.</s>

en: The community, which makes up 14% of Indias 1.4 billion population, is reeling from vilification by hard-line Hindu nationalists who have long espoused an anti-Muslim stance. Some leaders of Indias ruling Hindu nationalist Bharatiya Janata Party have tacitly supported the violence, while Prime Minister Narendra Modi has so far been silent about it. Eid al-Fitr is typically marked with communal prayers, celebratory gatherings around festive meals and new clothes, but celebrations in India for the past two years have been marred by COVID-19 restrictions.
kin: Uyu muryango ugizwe na 14% by'abaturage ba Indias miliyari 1.4, bahangayikishijwe no gutukwa n’abenegihugu b’Abahindu bakomeye kuva kera bashyigikiye imyigaragambyo yo kurwanya Abayisilamu. Bamwe mu bayobozi b’ishyaka riri ku butegetsi ry’Abahindu baharanira inyungu z’Abahindu bashyigikiye byimazeyo ihohoterwa, mu gihe Minisitiri w’intebe Narendra Modi kugeza ubu acecetse. Ubusanzwe Eid al-Fitr irangwa n'amasengesho rusange, guterana kwizihiza amafunguro y'iminsi mikuru hamwe n'imyenda mishya, ariko ibirori mu Buhinde mu myaka ibiri ishize byarangijwe na COVID-19.
mt0: <pad> Abantu benshi bavuga ko ari abanyedini, ariko ntibavuga ko ari Abanyagatolika.</s>

en: In Indian-controlled Kashmir, the Muslim festival has been subdued for the past three years because of an unprecedented military lockdown after India stripped the regions semi-autonomy in 2019, followed by the pandemic. The region also saw a rise in violence during Ramadan, with at least 20 militants, two civilians and five police and soldiers killed.
kin: Mu mujyi wa Kashmir ugenzurwa n’Ubuhinde, iserukiramuco ry’abayisilamu rimaze imyaka itatu ryigaruriwe n’igitero kitigeze kibaho nyuma y’uko Ubuhinde bwambuye uturere igice cyigenga muri 2019, hagakurikiraho icyorezo.
