en: Some medical experts have expressed concern that COVID-19 preventative measures, like masking and remote schooling, are potentially weakening childrens immune systems by shielding them from the usual childhood illnesses.
kin: Bamwe mu bahanga mu by'ubuvuzi bagaragaje impungenge z'uko ingamba zo gukumira COVID-19, nko guhisha no kwishuri rya kure, zishobora kugabanya intege nke z'abana babakingira indwara zisanzwe zo mu bwana.
mt0: <pad> Abayobozi bamwe mu rwego rw'ubuvuzi bavuga ko ibikoresho bya ntoki n'uburezi bukoreshwa kuri interineti bishobora gukomerera ubushobozi bw'abana bwo kwirinda indwara zaho zisanzwe.</s>

en: "There are a lot of reasons to believe that kids need to be exposed to things to keep their immunity complex, so that should they encounter something very dangerous, they have aspects of their immunity that might cross over and help protect them against those things," says Sara Sawyer, a professor of molecular, cellular and developmental biology at the University of Colorado Boulder.
kin: Hariho impamvu nyinshi zituma twemera ko abana bakeneye guhura nibintu kugirango bagumane ubudahangarwa bwabo, kuburyo nibaramuka bahuye nikintu kibi cyane, bafite ingingo zubudahangarwa bwabo zishobora kwambuka zikabafasha kubarinda ibyo bintu, ibi bikaba byavuzwe na Sara Sawyer, umwarimu w’ibinyabuzima bya molekuline, selile n’iterambere muri kaminuza ya Colorado Boulder.
mt0: <pad> "Hari impamvu nyinshi twemera ko abana bagomba guhura n'ibintu kugira ngo bagumane ubuzima bwabo bukomeye, kugira ngo niba bagiye bahura n'ikintu gifite umwanya uhagije, bafite ibice by'ubuzima bwabo bishobora guhuza kandi bibasha kubarinda icyo kintu," Sara Sawyer, umuhinga mu bijyanye n'ibinyabuzima n'imikorere ya selile muri kaminuza ya Colorado Boulder.</s>

en: At birth, vulnerable infants get antibodies from their mothers breast milk, which helps protect them until they can build their own immunity.
kin: Mu gihe cyo kuvuka, impinja zitagira kivurira zibona antibodi kuri ba nyina amashereka, abafasha kubarinda kugeza igihe bazubaka ubudahangarwa bwabo.
mt0: <pad> Baby nshya rimwe na rimwe bafite ubushobozi buke bwo gukora imyitwarire itandukanye, bikaba bifasha gukinga ibikomere byabo kugeza aho umuntu ashobora kwirinda.</s>

en: Its no accident that babies start putting things in their mouths as soon as they gain enough dexterity to pick things up.
kin: Ntabwo ari impanuka ko abana batangira gushyira ibintu mu munwa bakimara kugira ubuhanga buhagije bwo gutoragura ibintu.
mt0: <pad> Ntabwo ari impanuka ko abana batangira gushyira ibintu mu kanwa kabo ubwo bazaba bafite ubushobozi buhagije bwo gutora ibintu.</s>

en: "They're doing that because they're sampling the environment and building their immunity. That's an evolutionary trait," Sawyer says.
kin: Sawyer agira ati: "Ibyo babikora kubera ko batoranya ibidukikije kandi bakubaka ubudahangarwa bwabo. Iyo ni imwe mu bwihindurize."
mt0: <pad> "Bikoraga uko kubera ko bari gufata ibintu mu bihe byabo no gukora ubutabazi. Ni igikorwa cy'iterambere," Sawyer aravuga.</s>

en: "They're exposing their body to germs in a certain, level way to build their immunity.
kin: Bagaragaza umubiri wabo kuri mikorobe mu buryo runaka, bwo kubaka ubudahangarwa bwabo. Abantu bamwe rero bavuga ko indwara zo mu bwana, nk'ubukonje ndetse n'udukoko two mu gifu, byubaka ubudahangarwa bwacu kugira ngo igihe ibintu byinshi biteye akaga, twiteguye kandi ntituzarwara muri ibyo bintu bibi cyane.
mt0: <pad> "Bashyira ubuzima bwabo mu binyabuzima mu buryo butandukanye kugira ngo bafashe gukora imyitwarire yabo."</s>

en: Even before the pandemic, epidemiological evidence suggested that children in more developed countries, where handwashing and the use of sanitizer are more prevalent, might have less-developed immune systems compared to kids in developing nations who are routinely exposed to more bacteria, viruses and allergens.
kin: Ndetse na mbere y’icyorezo, ibimenyetso by’ibyorezo byerekanaga ko abana bo mu bihugu byateye imbere cyane, aho gukaraba intoki no gukoresha isuku byiganje, bashobora kuba bafite sisitemu y’umubiri idateye imbere ugereranije n’abana bo mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira y'amajyambere bakunze guhura na bagiteri nyinshi, virusi na allergene. .
mt0: <pad> Nubwo ntabwo umuntu uzi, ibimenyetso by'ubuvuzi bigaragaza ko abana bo mu bihugu byageze ku rwego rwo hejuru, aho gukaraba intoki no gukoresha imiti yo gutekereza ari uburyo bukunda gukoreshwa, bashobora kuba bafite imigisha idahwitse kurusha abana bo mu bihugu biri mu nzira y'amajyambere, aho buri munsi abana bafatwa n'udukoko, virusi n'ibinyabuzima.</s>

en: This makes kids in more industrialized countries more vulnerable to developing autoimmune diseases, according to whats known as the "hygiene hypothesis."
kin: Ibi bituma abana bo mu bihugu byinshi byateye imbere bibasirwa n'indwara ziterwa na autoimmune, ukurikije icyo bita "hypothesis yisuku."
mt0: <pad> This makes kids in more industrialized countries more vulnerable to developing autoimmune diseases, according to whats known as the "hygiene hypothesis," according to whats known as the "hygiene hypothesis."</s>

en: "The hygiene hypothesis is actually quite controversial because it's thought that our exposure to microbes isn't the only factor," says Cody Warren, a virologist and immunologist who is a postdoctoral fellow at the University of Colorado Boulder.
kin: Cody Warren, inzobere mu bijyanye na virusi akaba n'umu immunologue akaba ari umunyeshuri w’iposita muri kaminuza ya Colorado Boulder, agira ati: "Igitekerezo cy’isuku mu byukuri ntikivugwaho rumwe kuko twibwira ko guhura na mikorobe atari byo byonyine."
mt0: <pad> "Iryo ryerekezo ry'imibereho myiza ni ryerekezo itandukanye cyane kubera ko bivuze ko guhura n'udukoko atari kimwe mu bintu byagize uruhare," says Cody Warren, a virologist and immunologist who is a postdoctoral fellow at the University of Colorado Boulder.</s>

en: "A lot of this could also be dictated by genetics, diet, and the environment that we live in.
kin: Byinshi muri byo bishobora nanone guterwa na genetiki, imirire, n'ibidukikije dutuyemo. Ibyo kandi bigira uruhare runini mumubiri… nikintu gifatika tudashobora kubara byuzuye twambaye masike. Hariho ibindi bintu bijya muri iryo gereranya.
mt0: <pad> "Ibintu byinshi muri ibi bishobora kandi gushyirwaho n'ibikomoka ku binyabuzima, imyitwarire, n'ikirere dutuyemo."</s>

en: Warren, the father of three young children, says spending lots of time outdoors is one way to balance the negatives of isolation.
kin: Warren, se w'abana batatu bato, avuga ko kumara umwanya munini hanze ari bumwe mu buryo bwo guhuza ibibi byo kwigunga.
mt0: <pad> Warren, se w'abana batatu, avuga ko gufata umwanya munini hanze ni uburyo bwo kurengera ibibazo byo kwirukanwa.</s>

en: "Just exploring microbes in the environment also is benefiting [and] training our immune system," Warren says. "Our immune systems get trained through the foods that we eat, which also have microorganisms on them.
kin: Warren agira ati: "Gusa gukora ubushakashatsi kuri mikorobe mu bidukikije nabyo byunguka [no] guhugura umubiri." "Ubudahangarwa bw'umubiri bwacu butozwa binyuze mu biryo turya, bifite na mikorobe kuri byo.
mt0: <pad> "Kujya mu binyabuzima byo mu bidukikije n'ubundi ni uburyo bwo gutoza imyitwarire yacu," Warren says. "Imyitwarire yacu ikwigishwa mu mfunguro dufata, nayo ifite ibinyabuzima byo mu bidukikije."</s>

en: And so, despite the fact that we've kind of been hunkered down a little bit, I do feel that our immune systems will catch up."
kin: Kandi rero, nubwo twaba twarahigishijwe gato, ndumva ko ubudahangarwa bwacu buzafatwa. "
mt0: <pad> Nubwo twari twagize icyo dukora, ntekereza ko imigisha yacu igiye gusubira inyuma.</s>

en: There are other things parents can do, he says, to boost their childrens immune systems during pandemic times.
kin: Avuga ko hari ibindi bintu ababyeyi bashobora gukora, kugirango bongere abana babo ubudahangarwa bw'umubiri mugihe cyibyorezo.
mt0: <pad> Hari ibindi bintu abavyeyi bashobora gukora, avuga, kugira ngo bafashe abana babo imigisha mu gihe cy'icyorezo.</s>

en: "One of the most important things you can do is just to stay up to date on vaccines.
kin: "Kimwe mu bintu by'ingenzi ushobora gukora ni ugukomeza kugezwaho amakuru ku nkingo.
mt0: <pad> "Kimwe mu bintu bikomeye ushobora gukora ni uko uhora uri ku makuru ku bikoresho by'imiti yo kuvura indwara.</s>

en: That's one of the best ways that we have to train our immune systems," Warren says.
kin: Ubu ni bumwe mu buryo bwiza tugomba kumenyereza umubiri, "Warren.
mt0: <pad> "Ni imwe mu nzira nziza cyane dufite zo gukora imyitwarire yacu," Warren says.</s>

en: "But also, equally important is making sure our children have a good diet and they regulate stress.
kin: Ariko nanone, icy'ingenzi ni ukureba niba abana bacu bafite indyo yuzuye kandi bagenga imihangayiko. Byanditswe neza ko ibyo byombi - kugira indyo yuzuye, ibidukikije bidahangayikishije - bishobora kugira ingaruka nziza ku mikorere yacu.
mt0: <pad> "Ariko kandi, icyo kigomba gukora ni ugukomeza gukurikirana ko abana bacu bafite imfungurwa nziza kandi ko bahangayikishwa no gukubita ibitugu."</s>

en: Once public health officials say masks are no longer necessary, Sawyer thinks pointing out the positives of putting our masks away could reassure hesitant parents who worry about their children getting sick.
kin: Abashinzwe ubuzima rusange bamaze kuvuga ko masike atagikenewe, Sawyer atekereza ko kwerekana ibyiza byo gushyira maska ​​yacu bishobora guhumuriza ababyeyi bashidikanya bahangayikishijwe n’abana babo barwara.
mt0: <pad> Nubwo ntabwo uzi ko ibikoresho bya maski bikiri ngombwa, Sawyer abona ko gushimisha abafite impungenge ku bijyanye no gushyira amamaski mu ntoki bishobora gutuma ababyeyi bahangayika batinya ko abana babo bashobora kuba barwaye.</s>

en: "Maybe we should have a public conversation about the possible reasons to take that mask off, if they are in school, and get back to the normal repertoire of relatively safe childhood illnesses," she says.
kin: Agira ati: "Ahari twakagombye kugirana ikiganiro mbwirwaruhame ku mpamvu zishoboka zo gukuramo iyo mask, niba bari ku ishuri, hanyuma tugasubira mu ndirimbo zisanzwe z’indwara zo mu bwana zifite umutekano."
mt0: <pad> "Ibintu nk'ibi byagombye gukorwamo mu ruhame kugira ngo tumenye impamvu bashobora kuva muri mask, niba bari mu ishuri, kandi bagaruka ku bibazo bisanzwe by'abana bakiri bato," aravuga.</s>

en: "The plus side of childhood illnesses is that they can build up that hornet's nest of immunity that could protect kids against new things that then come along."
kin: Icyiza cy’indwara zo mu bwana ni uko zishobora kubaka icyari cya hornet cy’ubudahangarwa gishobora kurinda abana ibintu bishya hanyuma bikaza.

en: US Quietly Expands Asylum Limits While Preparing to End Them

en: The Biden administration has begun expelling Cubans and Nicaraguans to Mexico under pandemic-related powers to deny migrants a chance to seek asylum, expanding use of the rule even as it publicly says it has been trying to unwind it, officials said Wednesday.
kin: Ku wa gatatu, abayobozi bavuze ko ubuyobozi bwa Biden bwatangiye kwirukana Abanyakanani na Nikaragwa muri Mexico kubera ububasha bujyanye n’icyorezo bwo kwima abimukira amahirwe yo gusaba ubuhungiro, kwagura ikoreshwa ry’iryo tegeko nubwo rivuga ku mugaragaro ko ryagerageje kubireka.
mt0: <pad> Biden administration has begun expelling Cubans and Nicaraguans to Mexico under pandemic-related powers to deny migrants the chance to seek asylum, expanding use of the rule even as it publicly says it has been trying to unwind it.</s>

en: The U.S. struck agreement with Mexico to expel up to 100 Cubans and 20 Nicaraguans a day from three locations: San Diego; El Paso, Texas; and Rio Grande Valley, Texas, according to a U.S. official with direct knowledge of the effort.
kin: Amerika yagiranye amasezerano na Mexico yo kwirukana abanya Cuba 100 na Nikaragwa 20 kumunsi ahantu hatatu: San Diego; El Paso, muri Texas; n'ikibaya cya Rio Grande, muri Texas, nk'uko byatangajwe n'umuyobozi wa Amerika ufite ubumenyi butaziguye bw'imbaraga.
mt0: <pad> U.S. yashyize umukono ku masezerano na Mexico yo gukura abaturage ba Cuba n'abatuye Nicaragua mu bice bitatu: San Diego; El Paso, Texas; and Rio Grande Valley, Texas, nk'uko umuntu ufite ubumenyi buhamye bw'iyo gahunda yavuze.</s>

en: The expulsions began April 27 and will end May 22, the official told The Associated Press on condition of anonymity because the agreement has not been made public.
kin: Iyirukanwa ryatangiye ku ya 27 Mata rikazarangira ku ya 22 Gicurasi, nk'uko uyu muyobozi yabitangarije ibiro ntaramakuru by'Abanyamerika kugira ngo atamenyekana kubera ko ayo masezerano atashyizwe ahagaragara.
mt0: <pad> Ayo mabwiriza yatangiye tariki 27 Mata, kandi azashira ku wa 22 Gicurasi, umuntu w'umunyamabanga yabwiye The Associated Press ku bushake bw'uko nta kintu kizwi cyavuzwe.</s>

en: They are carried out under Title 42 authority, a public health law that has been used to expel migrants on grounds of preventing spread of COVID-19. Title 42 is due to expire May 23, unless a judge intervenes.
kin: Bikorerwa munsi yumutwe wa 42, itegeko ryubuzima rusange ryakoreshejwe mu kwirukana abimukira ku mpamvu zo gukumira ikwirakwizwa rya COVID-19. Umutwe wa 42 ugomba kurangira ku ya 23 Gicurasi, keretse umucamanza abigizemo uruhare.
mt0: <pad> Ariko ntiwumva ko umuntu uzi.</s>

en: The U.S. and Mexico agreed April 26 to a very limited number of expulsions of Cubans and Nicaraguans, according to a high-level Mexican official who spoke on condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to comment publicly.
kin: Nk’uko byatangajwe n'umuyobozi wo mu rwego rwo hejuru wo muri Megizike wavuze ko atigeze atangazwa kubera ko batemerewe kugira icyo batangaza ku mugaragaro, Amerika na Mexico byumvikanye ku ya 26 Mata ku mubare muto cyane wo kwirukana Abanyakanani na Nikaragwa.
mt0: <pad> U.S. na Mexico byumvikanye ku wa 26 Mata ku ntego ntoya yo guhunga Abanyamerika n'Abanyanicaragu, nk'uko umuntu ufite ububasha bw'umunyamexiko yabwiye BBC ko nta kintu kinini cyo guhunga cyakozwe.</s>

en: It was prompted by higher numbers of migrants from those two countries coming to the U.S. border.
kin: Byatewe numubare munini w’abimukira bava muri ibyo bihugu byombi baza kumupaka wa Amerika.
mt0: <pad> It byatewe n'umubare munini w'abimukira baturutse muri izo bihugu bagenda ku rubibe rw'Amerika.</s>

en: Mexico also took into account that the U.S. government had started processing visas in Cuba again, the official said. Mexico had also begun processing visas for Cubans.
kin: Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko Mexico kandi yazirikanye ko guverinoma y'Amerika yatangiye gutunganya viza muri Cuba. Mexico nayo yari yatangiye gutunganya viza kubanya Cuba.
mt0: <pad> Mexico nayo yafashe intoki ko Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zagarutse gukora viza muri Cuba, uwo munyamabanga yavuze. Mexico yari yatanguye gutanga viza ku banyacubani.</s>

en: Another Mexican official, also not authorized to comment publicly, confirmed that up to 100 Cubans and 20 Nicaraguans were being expelled from San Diego under Title 42.
kin: Undi muyobozi wo muri Megizike, na we utemerewe kugira icyo atangaza ku mugaragaro, yemeje ko Abanyakanani bagera kuri 100 na Nikaragwa 20 birukanwa muri San Diego ku mutwe wa 42.
mt0: <pad> Another Mexican official, also not authorized to comment publicly, confirmed that up to 100 Cubans and 20 Nicaraguans were being expelled from San Diego under Title 42 under the immigration law.</s>

en: The U.S. Department of Homeland Security did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

mt0: <pad> U.S. Department of Homeland Security did not immediately respond to a request for comment.</s>

en: Until last week, Mexico only agreed to take Guatemalans, Hondurans and El Salvadorans — in addition to Mexicans — under Title 42 authority. Other nationalities are subject to Title 42 but costs, strained diplomatic ties and other considerations often make it difficult to send them back to their home countries.
kin: Kugeza mu cyumweru gishize, Mexico yemeye gufata Guatemala, Hondurans na El Salvadorans - usibye Abanyamegizike - ku butegetsi bwa 42. Abandi benegihugu bagengwa na Umutwe wa 42 ariko ikiguzi, umubano wububanyi n’ububanyi n’ibindi bitekerezo akenshi biragoye kubasubiza mu bihugu byabo.
mt0: <pad> Kubera ko ubwa mbere, Mexico yaje gufata gusa Guatemalans, Hondurans na El Salvadorans — kimwe na Mexicans — ku rutonde rw'amategeko ya 42 y'inzira y'ubuzima. Ariko abandi banyarwanda b'amoko yose ni abarenga kuri urwo rutonde ariko ibiciro, ubucuti bubi n'ibindi bibazo byinshi bituma bigoye gutangaruka mu bihugu byabo.</s>

en: It's next to impossible for the U.S. to expel migrants to Cuba or Nicaragua because of poor relations with those governments.
kin: Bikurikira ntibishoboka ko Amerika yirukana abimukira muri Cuba cyangwa Nikaragwa kubera umubano mubi na guverinoma.
mt0: <pad> U.S. ntabwo ishobora guhunga abanyamerika bajya muri Cuba cyangwa muri Nicaragua kubera ubucuti bubi na leta z'ibi bihugu.</s>

en: That has posed a challenge for the Biden administration as more people from those countries seek haven in the United States.

en: Cubans were stopped by U.S. authorities more than 32,000 times on the Mexican border in March, double the number in February and more than five times October's count, according to U.S. Customs and Border Protection. Nicaragua eased travel restrictions from Cuba in November, making it easier for Cubans to continue by land to the U.S. border. Most enter the U.S. in or near Yuma, Arizona, and Del Rio, Texas.
kin: Nk’uko byatangajwe na gasutamo ya Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika, ngo abanya Cuba bahagaritswe n'abayobozi b'Abanyamerika inshuro zirenga 32.000 ku mupaka wa Mexico, bakubye kabiri muri Gashyantare ndetse bakubye inshuro zirenga eshanu Ukwakira. Nikaragwa yorohereje imbogamizi z’ingendo ziva muri Cuba mu Gushyingo, byorohereza Abanyakanada gukomeza ku butaka kugera ku mupaka wa Amerika. Benshi binjira muri Amerika cyangwa hafi ya Yuma, Arizona, na Del Rio, Texas.
mt0: <pad> Cubans were stopped by U.S. authorities more than 32,000 times on the Mexican border in March, double the number in February and more than five times October's count, according to U.S. Customs and Border Protection. Nicaragua eased travel restrictions from Cuba in November, making it easier for Cubans to continue by land to the U.S. border. Most enter the U.S. in or near Yuma, Arizona, and Del Rio, Texas.</s>

en: Nicaraguans were stopped more than 16,000 times in March, more than double September's level. The vast majority enter in South Texas.
kin: Muri Werurwe, Nikaragwa yahagaritswe inshuro zirenga 16.000, irenga inshuro ebyiri Nzeri. Umubare munini winjira muri Texas yepfo.
mt0: <pad> Nicaraguani zari zahagaritse mu kwezi kwa gatatu kurusha 16,000, byasaga kabiri urugero rwo muri Nzeri. Icyinshi cyabonaga muri Texas yo muri Sudani y'Amajyepfo.</s>

en: Lifting Title 42 has proved controversial as midterm elections near, even for Biden's Democratic Party, amid concerns that the U.S. is unprepared for an anticipated increase in migrants seeking asylum. Authorities stopped migrants more than 221,000 times in March, the highest mark in 22 years.
kin: Kuzamura Umutwe wa 42 byagaragaye ko bitavugwaho rumwe nk’amatora yo hagati, ndetse no mu ishyaka rya demokarasi rya Biden, mu gihe hari impungenge z’uko Amerika ititeguye kwiyongera kw’abimukira bashaka ubuhungiro. Muri Werurwe, abategetsi bahagaritse abimukira inshuro zirenga 221.000, kikaba aricyo kintu kinini mu myaka 22.
mt0: <pad> Ubwo uvuga ko utabizi, ntiwamenya</s>

en: The White House and Homeland Security Department have publicly stood behind the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's decision to end the measure because it could no longer be justified on grounds of protecting public health.
kin: Ishami ry’umutekano n’umutekano mu gihugu ryashyigikiye ku mugaragaro icyemezo cy’ikigo gishinzwe kurwanya no gukumira indwara cyo guhagarika iki cyemezo kuko kitagishoboye kuba gifite ishingiro kubera kurengera ubuzima rusange.
mt0: <pad> White House na Department of Homeland Security bavuga ko bashimiye Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's decision to end the measure because it could no longer be justified on the basis of protecting public health.</s>

en: But the practice of expelling Cubans and Nicaraguans runs counter to the administration's public statements that it was phasing out use of the pandemic powers to prepare for May 23.
kin: Ariko imyitozo yo kwirukana abanya Cuba na Nikaragwa irahabanye n’ubuyobozi bwatangaje ko bwagiye bukuraho imbaraga z’icyorezo kugira ngo bitegure ku ya 23 Gicurasi.
mt0: <pad> Ariko ibikorwa byo guhungabana n'Abanyacubani n'Abanyanicaragu bihabanye n'ibitangazo bya leta ko yari irimo kugabanya ikoreshwa ry'ingufu za pandemic kugira ngo yitegure muri Mata.</s>

en: The U.S. has expelled migrants more than 1.8 million times under Title 42 authority since March 2020, effectively overriding rights to seek asylum under U.S. law and international treaty. In doing so, migrants are not subject to immigration law, which include rights to seek protection from persecution at home.
kin: Kuva muri Werurwe 2020, Amerika yirukanye abimukira inshuro zirenga miliyoni 1.8 ku butegetsi bwa Umutwe wa 42, bivuguruza uburenganzira bwo gusaba ubuhungiro hakurikijwe amategeko ya Amerika n'amasezerano mpuzamahanga. Mu kubikora, abimukira ntibagengwa n'amategeko y’abinjira, akubiyemo uburenganzira bwo kurindwa ibitotezo mu ngo.
mt0: <pad> U.S. yarekuye abaturage bagera ku bihumbi 1,8 mu rwego rwa Title 42 kuva muri Werurwe 2020, byuzuye uburenganzira bwo gusaba ubuhungiro mu mategeko y'Amerika n'amategeko mpuzamakungu. Mu gukora ibi, abaturage ntibahabwa uburenganzira bwo gusaba ubuhungiro mu mategeko y'inzira y'abimukira, harimo uburenganzira bwo gusaba ubutabazi bwo kwirinda igitero mu gihugu cyabo.</s>

en: The administration said in court filings that it began processing more Central American adults under immigration laws after the CDC's announcement on April 1. But a federal judge in Louisiana ruled last week that it couldn't start unwinding Title 42 while it was still in effect.
kin: Ubuyobozi bwatangaje mu rukiko ko bwatangiye gutunganya abantu benshi bakuze bo muri Amerika yo Hagati bakurikiza amategeko y’abinjira nyuma y’uko CDC ibitangaza ku ya 1 Mata.
mt0: <pad> Abayobozi bavuga ko batangiye gukurikirana abantu bakiri bato bo muri Amerika yo Hagati mu mategeko y'inzira nyuma y'uko CDC yatangaje ku wa 1 Mata. Nyamara umucamanza wo muri leta ya Louisiana yavuze ko ntabwo ishobora gutangira gukuraho icyemezo cya Title 42 mu gihe cyose kikiri mu bikorwa.</s>

en: U.S. District Judge Robert Summerhays strongly criticized the CDC's decision, suggesting he would try to keep Title 42 in effect after May 23. A hearing is scheduled May 13 for oral arguments.
kin: Umucamanza w'akarere ka Amerika, Robert Summerhays, yanenze cyane icyemezo cya CDC, avuga ko azagerageza gukomeza Umutwe wa 42 nyuma y'itariki ya 23 Gicurasi.
mt0: <pad> U.S. District Judge Robert Summerhays ashyamiye cyane CDC's decision, suggesting he would try to keep Title 42 in effect after May 23.</s>

en: Marisa Limon, senior director of advocacy and planning at the Hope Border Institute, said advocates began learning about expulsions of Cubans and Nicaraguans from El Paso on Monday and later confirmed the new practice with U.S. officials.
kin: Umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubuvugizi n’igenamigambi mu kigo cya Hope Border, Marisa Limon, yavuze ko abunganizi batangiye kwiga ibijyanye no kwirukana Abanyakanani na Nikaragwa muri El Paso ku wa mbere nyuma baza kwemeza imikorere mishya hamwe n’abayobozi ba Amerika.
mt0: <pad> Marisa Limon, umunyamabanga mukuru w'ibikorwa by'ubutabera n'iteganyabikorwa mu kigo Hope Border Institute, yavuze ko ubwo bwicanyi bwabaye ku wa Mbere nyuma yo gukurikiranwa n'ubuyobozi bw'Amerika.</s>

en: Limon said the administration is "trying to get every last bit out of Title 42" before it expires.
kin: Limon yavuze ko ubuyobozi "bugerageza gukuramo buri kintu cya nyuma mu mutwe wa 42" kitararangira.
mt0: <pad> Limon yavuze ko ubutegetsi "bugerageza gukuramo buri kintu cy'inyongera muri Ishingiro rya 42" mbere yo kuvaho.</s>

en: She called it "sobering" but consistent with the administration's efforts to have other countries in the Western hemisphere take more responsibility for hosting people fleeing their homes.
kin: Yayise "gutekereza" ariko ahuza n'imbaraga z'ubuyobozi kugira ngo ibindi bihugu byo mu gice cy'iburengerazuba bigire uruhare runini mu kwakira abantu bahunga ingo zabo.
mt0: <pad> She called it "sobering" but consistent with the administration's efforts to have other countries in the Western hemisphere take more responsibility for hosting people fleeing their homes.</s>

en: Mexico Relocates Migrant Camp; Haitians Appear at Border
kin: Mexico yimuye inkambi y'abimukira; Abanyahayitiya bagaragara kumupaka
mt0: <pad> Mexico Relocates Migrant Camp; Haitians Appear at Border</s>

en: Mexican authorities said Tuesday they have relocated a migrant camp that sprung up in a park in the border city of Reynosa, moving about 2,000 people from Central America and Haiti to a shelter in the city, across the border from McAllen, Texas.
kin: Ku wa kabiri, abategetsi ba Mexico bavuze ko bimuye inkambi y’abimukira yavukiye muri parike iri mu mujyi wa Reynosa uhana imbibi, yimura abantu bagera ku 2000 bava muri Amerika yo Hagati na Haiti mu buhungiro mu mujyi, hakurya y’umupaka na McAllen, muri Texas.
mt0: <pad> Mexican authorities said Tuesday they have relocated a migrant camp that sprung up in a park in the border city of Reynosa, moving about 2,000 people from Central America and Haiti to a shelter in the city, across the border from McAllen, Texas.</s>

en: The camp of migrants mainly from Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras and Haiti sprung up after U.S. officials, citing the pandemic, invoked a health rule that denies migrants a chance to seek asylum.
kin: Inkambi y'abimukira ahanini baturutse muri Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras na Haiti imaze kuvuka nyuma yuko abayobozi ba Amerika, bavuga ko iki cyorezo, basabye itegeko ry’ubuzima ryanga abimukira amahirwe yo gusaba ubuhungiro.
mt0: <pad> Camp of migrants mainly from Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras and Haiti sprung up after U.S. officials, citing the pandemic, invoked a health rule that denies migrants the chance to seek asylum.</s>

en: Mexico's National Immigration Institute said the migrants were taken around midnight Monday to the shelter, which it said will have better hygiene and food services.
kin: Ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe abinjira n'abasohoka muri Mexico cyatangaje ko abimukira bajyanywe mu gicuku cyo ku wa mbere bakajya mu buhungiro, buvuga ko buzagira isuku na serivisi nziza.
mt0: <pad> Mexican National Immigration Institute said the migrants were taken to the shelter around midnight Monday, which it said will have better hygiene and food services.</s>

en: But on Monday, people in another border city, Nuevo Laredo, said hundreds of migrants, mainly Haitians, have streamed into that city, which is across the border from Laredo, Texas
kin: Ariko ku wa mbere, abantu bo mu wundi mujyi uhana imbibi, Nuevo Laredo, bavuze ko abimukira babarirwa mu magana, cyane cyane Abanyahayiti, binjiye muri uwo mujyi, uhana imbibi na Laredo, muri Texas.
mt0: <pad> But on Monday, people in another border city, Nuevo Laredo, said hundreds of migrants, mainly Haitians, have streamed into that city, which is across the border from Laredo, Texas.</s>

en: The rush apparently started after the U.S. began processing some asylum-seekers there.
kin: Kwihuta bigaragara ko byatangiye nyuma yuko Amerika itangiye gutunganya bamwe mubasaba ubuhungiro.
mt0: <pad> Umubare w'abantu ugera muri Amerika wagabanutse cyane nyuma y'uko Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yatangiye gukora bamwe mu bashaka ubuhungiro bagendayo.</s>

en: The Catholic bishop of Nuevo Laredo said Monday that migrant shelters there are overcrowded, with some migrants sleeping outside in tents.
kin: Umwepiskopi gatolika wa Nuevo Laredo yavuze ku wa mbere ko aho abimukira bahurira huzuye, aho abimukira bamwe baryama hanze mu mahema.
mt0: <pad> Bishop of Nuevo Laredo, the bishop of Catholic church in northern Mexico, said Monday that migrant shelters there are overcrowded, with some migrants sleeping outside in tents.</s>

en: Bishop Enrique Sánchez Martínez said migrants started streaming into Nuevo Laredo in late April, though the city isn't usually popular among migrants, in part because it is dominated by the violent Northeast drug cartel.
kin: Musenyeri Enrique Sánchez Martínez yavuze ko abimukira batangiye kwinjira muri Nuevo Laredo mu mpera za Mata, nubwo uyu mujyi udakunzwe cyane n'abimukira, kubera ko wiganjemo amakarito y’ibiyobyabwenge yo mu majyaruguru y'uburasirazuba.
mt0: <pad> Bishop Enrique Sánchez Martínez said migrants began streaming into Nuevo Laredo in late April, though the city isn't usually popular among migrants, in part because it is dominated by the violent Northeast drug cartel.</s>

en: "It is new for us because this is the last place they come, due to the conditions of our border, of our city, which are sometimes adverse for migrants," the bishop said.
kin: Umwepiskopi yagize ati: "Ni shyashya kuri twe kuko aha niho hantu ha nyuma baza, bitewe n'imipaka yacu, umujyi wacu, rimwe na rimwe bikaba bibi ku bimukira."
mt0: <pad> "Ni nshya kuri twe kuko niho hanyuma bazaba, bitewe n'ibibazo bya mpaka zacu, icyo gisagara cyacu, rimwe na rimwe bibangamiye abahungabana," umuherezabitambo yavuze.</s>

en: "But since they opened the door in the United States to asylum requests, a lot of them came in large groups."
kin: "Ariko kuva bafungura umuryango muri Amerika gusaba ubuhunzi, benshi muri bo baza mu matsinda manini."
mt0: <pad> "Ariko kuva ubwo Amerika yafunguye imiryango y'abasaba ubuhungiro, benshi muri bo bazanye mu bihe byinshi.</s>

en: Marvin Ajic, the director of the Casa Nazareth shelter, said that around April 16, Mexican authorities notified the shelters that the United States would resume processing asylum claims for humanitarian reasons.
kin: Umuyobozi w'ikigo cya Casa Nazareth, Marvin Ajic, yavuze ko ahagana ku ya 16 Mata, abategetsi ba Mexico bamenyesheje ubwo buhungiro ko Amerika izakomeza gutunganya ibirego by'ubuhunzi kubera impamvu z’ubutabazi.
mt0: <pad> Marvin Ajic, umuyobozi wa Casa Nazareth, yavuze ko muri Mata ubwa kabiri, Mexican authorities notified the shelters that the United States would resume processing asylum claims for humanitarian reasons.</s>

en: The U.S. had begun allowing more people in, especially Central American adults, to prepare for lifting Title 42 — a pandemic-era health rule that denies migrants a chance to enter the U.S. seek asylum — on May 23. But a federal judge in Louisiana ruled last week that the government could not unwind the rule before the end date.
kin: Ku ya 23 Gicurasi, Amerika yari yatangiye kwemerera abantu benshi, cyane cyane abakuze bo muri Amerika yo Hagati, kwitegura gukuraho Umutwe wa 42 - itegeko ry’ubuzima bwo mu gihe cy’icyorezo kibuza abimukira amahirwe yo kwinjira muri Amerika gusaba ubuhungiro - ku ya 23 Gicurasi. Ariko umucamanza wa federasiyo muri Louisiana yemeje icyumweru gishize ko guverinoma idashobora gukuraho iryo tegeko mbere yitariki yo kurangiriraho.
mt0: <pad> U.S. yari yatangiye gutanga abantu benshi muri, cyane cyane abakuze bo muri Amerika yo Hagati, kugira ngo itegure gukuraho Title 42 — itegeko ryo mu gihe cy'icyorezo rya coronavirus rimwemeraga abaturage bavuga ko ari impunzi — ku wa 23 Gicurasi. Ariko umucamanza wo muri Louisiana yategetse ko leta itashoboraga gukuraho itegeko mbere y'uko ryimurwa.</s>

en: "The (Mexican) immigration officials organized things with the shelters, and the plan was to send people who had been waiting a long time, without any checks, basically anyone," Ajic said.
kin: Ajic yagize ati: "Abashinzwe abinjira n'abasohoka (Abanyamegizike) bateguye ibintu hamwe n'ubuhungiro, kandi gahunda yari iyo kohereza abantu bari bategereje igihe kirekire, nta sheki bafite, cyane cyane umuntu uwo ari we wese."
mt0: <pad> "Abakozi ba Mexican immigration bateguye ibintu n'ibigo by'abibumbye, kandi intego yari yo gutanga abantu bamaze igihe kirekire, nta kubikisha, muri rusange buri wese," Ajic yavuze.</s>

en: That apparently drew the attention of other migrants, including Haitians.
kin: Ikigaragara ni uko ibyo byashimishije abandi bimukira, harimo n'Abanyahayiti.
mt0: <pad> Byagaragaye ko byatwaye n'abandi ba mukerarugendo, harimo Abanyahaiti.</s>

en: In September, similar rumors sparked a rush by about 15,000 mostly Haitian refugees to the Texas border, where they camped under a bridge. U.S. officials began large scale deportations of Haitians while also allowing thousands to remain in the U.S.
kin: Muri Nzeri, ibihuha nk'ibyo byatumye abantu bagera ku 15.000 bihutira cyane cyane impunzi zo muri Hayiti kugera ku mupaka wa Texas, aho bakambitse munsi y'ikiraro. Abayobozi ba Amerika batangiye kwirukana Abanyahayiti benshi mu gihe banemerera ibihumbi kuguma muri Amerika
mt0: <pad> Mu kwezi kwa 9, ibi binyoma byateye urujya n'uruza rw'abantu bagera ku 15,000, benshi muri bo ni Abanyagatolika, mu gihugu cya Texas, aho bategereje imbere y'uruzitiro. Abayobozi ba Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batangiye guhungabana n'Abanyahaiti ariko abandi bakaba barashoboye kubaho.</s>

en: Ajic warned migrants against coming to the border, noting the risks. On Monday, Mexico's National Immigration Institute said that so far this year, it has pulled the bodies of 19 immigrants from the Rio Grande, also known as the Rio Bravo.
kin: Ajic yihanangirije abimukira kwirinda kuza ku mupaka, avuga ingaruka. Ku wa mbere, Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe abinjira n’abasohoka muri Mexico cyavuze ko kugeza uyu mwaka, kimaze gukuramo imirambo y’abimukira 19 bava muri Rio Grande, izwi kandi ku izina rya Rio Bravo.
mt0: <pad> Ajic yaburiye impunzi ko batagomba kugera ku rubibe, avuga ko hari ingaruka.</s>

en: New US Rule Grants Automatic Work Permit Extensions to Noncitizens
kin: Amategeko mashya yo muri Amerika atanga uruhushya rwo gukora rwikora kubaturage
mt0: <pad> New US Rule Grants Automatic Work Permit Extensions to Noncitizens</s>

en: U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) announced Tuesday that it would automatically extend for 360 days the work permits of immigrants who applied to renew their work authorization amid the current backlog in processing times.
kin: Serivisi ishinzwe abenegihugu n’abinjira n’abasohoka muri Amerika (USCIS) yatangaje ku wa kabiri ko izahita yongerwa iminsi 360 uruhushya rwo gukora rw’abimukira basabye kuvugurura uruhushya rw’akazi mu gihe kiri inyuma mu gihe cyo gutunganya.
mt0: <pad> USCIS yatangaje ko izahindura imirimo y'abavuga ko bashaka gusubira muri Amerika mu gihe cy'amezi atandatu ibisabwa kugira ngo bashobore gukora.</s>

en: The new notice expands on the 180-day extension USCIS announced in November. It is expected to prevent about 260,000 immigrants from losing their work permits in the next 18 months. It will also give the agency extra time to clear applicants waiting in line, the agency said in a statement.
kin: Amatangazo mashya yagutse ku iyongerwa ry'iminsi 180 USCIS yatangaje mu Gushyingo. Biteganijwe ko bizabuza abimukira bagera ku 260.000 gutakaza uruhushya rwo gukora mu mezi 18 ari imbere. Bizatanga kandi ikigo cy’inyongera cyo gukuraho abasaba gutegereza umurongo, nkuko byatangajwe n’ikigo.
mt0: <pad> USCIS yatanze ibihano ku bantu bashaka gukora mu gihugu.</s>

en: "This temporary rule will provide those noncitizens otherwise eligible for the automatic extension an opportunity to maintain employment and provide critical support for their families while avoiding further disruption for U.S. employers," USCIS Director Ur M. Jaddou said in a statement.
kin: Mu ijambo rye, Umuyobozi wa USCIS, Ur M. Jaddou, yagize ati: "Iri tegeko ry’agateganyo rizaha abo banyagihugu ubundi bemerewe kongererwa mu buryo bwikora amahirwe yo gukomeza akazi no gutanga inkunga ikomeye ku miryango yabo mu gihe birinda ko hajyaho ihungabana ku bakoresha ba Amerika."
mt0: <pad> "Iyi ngingo ntarengwa izatanga abashobora kuba batari abaturage uburenganzira bwo gusaba kongera gukora no gutanga ubufasha bukomeye ku miryango yabo, mu gihe nta gushidikanya ko uturere twa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zigerwaho n'ibibazo byiyongereye."</s>

en: The extension, which takes effect Wednesday, aims to stabilize operations for U.S. employers and help people with pending employment authorizations who have a job and are working in the U.S.
kin: Iyongerekana ritangira gukurikizwa ku wa gatatu, rigamije guhuza ibikorwa ku bakoresha ba Amerika no gufasha abantu bafite uburenganzira bwo gutegereza bafite akazi kandi bakorera muri Amerika.
mt0: <pad> Uko uvuga nti uzi</s>

en: USCIS is the agency in charge of handling the nation's immigration paperwork. In recent years, it has struggled with backlogs, an issue made worse by the COVID-19 pandemic and budget shortfalls.
kin: USCIS nicyo kigo gishinzwe gukemura impapuro z’abinjira mu gihugu. Mu myaka yashize, yahanganye n'ibibazo bidasubirwaho, ikibazo cyarushijeho kuba icyorezo cya COVID-19 hamwe no kubura ingengo yimari.
mt0: <pad> USCIS ni urwego rukurikirana imirimo y'inzira y'abaturage muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Mu myaka yashize, rwari rumaze guhura n'ibibazo by'imbogamizi, ikibazo cyagize ingaruka mbi kubera pandemiya ya COVID-19 n'inguzanyo nke.</s>

en: In April, Jaddou told U.S. government officials during a congressional hearing that USCIS had 8.5 million pending immigration cases, including those seeking green cards and U.S. naturalization.
kin: Muri Mata, Jaddou yabwiye abayobozi ba leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika mu gihe cy’iburanisha ry’inteko ishinga amategeko ko USCIS ifite miliyoni 8.5 zitegereje imanza z’abinjira n’abinjira, harimo n’abashaka amakarita y’icyatsi ndetse n’ubwenegihugu bwa Amerika.
mt0: <pad> Intore zari zaje mu gihugu cyacu, ntibazi ko hari abantu benshi cyane.</s>

en: She said more than half of those pending cases were taking longer than the agency's normal processing times.
kin: Yavuze ko kimwe cya kabiri cy’izo manza zitarangizwa zafashe igihe kirenze igihe cy’ikigo gisanzwe.
mt0: <pad> Bye bye lawyers.</s>

en: Asylum-seekers, immigrants adjusting their status to permanent residence and other noncitizens going through the U.S. immigration process are among the noncitizens affected by the latest work authorization extension.
kin: Abasaba ubuhungiro, abimukira bahindura status yabo gutura burundu hamwe nabandi banyagihugu banyura muri gahunda y’abinjira n’abanyamerika bari mu baturage badafite ingaruka ku iyongerwa ry’akazi riheruka.
mt0: <pad> Abari mu buhungiro, abashaka ubuhungiro n'abandi batari abaturage bagenda mu nzira zo kwimukira muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ni bamwe mu bataragera ku rwego rw'abaturage bagizweho ingaruka n'amabwiriza mashya ya gukora.</s>

en: The agency had reported that processing times for asylum applicants looking to renew work permits increased from seven months in 2017 to 11 months in 2021.
kin: Ikigo cyari cyatangaje ko igihe cyo gutunganya abasaba ubuhunzi bashaka kuvugurura impushya zo gukora cyiyongereye kuva ku mezi arindwi muri 2017 kigera ku mezi 11 muri 2021.
mt0: <pad> Ariko nubwo ntabwo uzi icyo kuvuga, umuntu ashobora gukora ibintu byinshi.</s>

en: In March, USCIS announced a program to reduce backlogs, including the expansion of premium processing for certain applications where applicants could pay a higher fee to expedite paperwork processing.
kin: Muri Werurwe, USCIS yatangaje gahunda yo kugabanya ibirarane, harimo no kwagura progaramu ya progaramu ya progaramu zimwe aho abasaba bashobora kwishyura amafaranga menshi kugirango byihutishe gutunganya impapuro.
mt0: <pad> Mu kwezi kwa gatatu, USCIS yatangaje uburyo bwo kugabanya umubare w'ibibazo byakira ibicuruzwa, harimo gushyiraho uburyo bwo gutanga amafaranga menshi ku bicuruzwa bimwe na bimwe aho abasaba kuba barashoboraga kwishyura amafaranga menshi kugira ngo umuntu ashobora gutangira gukora inyandiko y'inzira y'umunyamahanga.</s>

en: According to the USCIS, most of the announced changes simply restore options offered before the Trump administration's slowdown of USCIS processing and before the COVID-19 pandemic further slowed the agency's resources.
kin: Nk’uko USCIS ibigaragaza, impinduka nyinshi zatangajwe gusa zigarura gusa amahitamo yatanzwe mbere y’uko ubuyobozi bwa Trump butinda gutunganya USCIS ndetse na mbere y’icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyadindije umutungo w’ikigo.
mt0: <pad> Bye bye USCIS, most of the changes announced are just restoring options offered before Trump administration's slowdown of USCIS processing and before the COVID-19 pandemic further slowed the agency's resources.</s>

en: "For several years, USCIS has been in a precarious financial situation that has impaired the efficient completion of caseloads.
kin: Hashize imyaka itari mike, USCIS ihura n'ikibazo cy'ubukungu cyabujije kurangiza neza amakarito.
mt0: <pad> "Mu myaka myinshi, USCIS yagize ikibazo cy'amafaranga kimeze nabi cyane ku buryo byagabanyije umwanya wo gukora neza imirimo y'abakozi."</s>

en: The COVID-19 pandemic exacerbated these challenges in 2020, in addition to a hiring freeze and furlough threat leading to workforce attrition and severely reduced capacity.
kin: Icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyakajije umurego muri 2020, hiyongereyeho gukonjesha akazi no gukangisha abantu bigatuma abakozi binjira kandi bikagabanya cyane ubushobozi.
mt0: <pad> COVID-19 pandemic yagize ingaruka mbi kuri ibi bibazo muri 2020, hamwe no gufunga guhabwa akazi no guhungabana ku kazi bitera uruhare runaka rw'abakozi n'imbaraga nyinshi ziyongereye.</s>

en: In 2021, before USCIS could recover from these fiscal and operational impacts, there was a sudden and dramatic increase in EAD (Employment Authorization Document) initial and renewal filings," according to the USCIS statement.

en: What Is the US-Launched 'Uniting for Ukraine' Program?
kin: Niki Gahunda yatangijwe na Amerika 'Guhuriza hamwe muri Ukraine'?
mt0: <pad> Ni iki icyo kiganiro cya Amerika gishya 'Urubuga rw'u Bufaransa ku cyambu cya Ukraine'?</s>

en: U.S. President Joe Biden recently announced the Uniting for Ukraine program, which aims to streamline the process for Ukrainians who have fled their country and are seeking safety in the United States.
kin: Perezida wa Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika, Joe Biden, aherutse gutangaza gahunda y’ubumwe bwa Ukraine, igamije koroshya inzira ku Banya Ukraine bahunze igihugu cyabo kandi bashaka umutekano muri Amerika.
mt0: <pad> Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden yatangaje ibikorwa byo gufatanya na Ukraine, bigamije koroha uburyo bw'umuntu w'Umunyaukraine uba mu gihugu cye kandi ukeneye ubuzima muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.</s>

en: The new program, which took effect Monday, will complement existing legal pathways available to those fleeing Russian aggression due to the ongoing Russia-Ukraine crisis, Biden administration officials said.
kin: Abayobozi b'ubuyobozi bwa Biden bavuze ko iyi gahunda nshya yatangiye gukurikizwa ku wa mbere, izuzuza inzira zemewe n'amategeko zihari ku bahunga igitero cy'Uburusiya kubera ikibazo cy'Uburusiya na Ukraine gikomeje.
mt0: <pad> Abayobozi ba Biden bavuze ko icyo gihembwe kishya kizaba kigomba kongera uburenganzira bw'inzira y'ubutabera buhari ku bantu bagendaga bava muri ruswa bitewe n'ikibazo cya Ukraine na Russia.</s>

en: "The U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS) will continue to provide relief to the Ukrainian people, while supporting our European allies who have shouldered so much as the result of Russia's brutal invasion of Ukraine," Secretary of Homeland Security Alejandro Mayorkas said in a statement to reporters on April 21.
kin: Umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe umutekano mu gihugu, Alejandro Mayorkas, yagize ati: "Minisiteri ishinzwe umutekano mu gihugu cya Amerika (DHS) izakomeza gutanga ubutabazi ku baturage ba Ukraine, mu gihe ishyigikiye ibihugu byacu by’i Burayi bitwaje intwaro nyinshi bitewe n’uko Uburusiya bwateye muri Ukraine bunyamaswa." itangazo ku banyamakuru ku ya 21 Mata.
mt0: <pad> U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS) will continue to provide relief to the people of Ukraine, while supporting our European allies who have shouldered so much as the result of Russia's brutal invasion of Ukraine," Secretary of Homeland Security Alejandro Mayorkas said in a statement to reporters on April 21.</s>

en: What is Uniting for Ukraine?
kin: Guhuza Ukraine ni iki?
mt0: <pad> icyo umuntu ashaka kuvuga ni iki?</s>

en: The program allows U.S. citizens and residents to sponsor Ukrainian refugees under different immigration statuses. The online portal, open to potential sponsors or organizations, is accepting applications and has received more than 4,000 requests so far, CNN reported.
kin: Porogaramu yemerera abanyamerika n’abaturage gutera inkunga impunzi zo muri Ukraine mu bihe bitandukanye by’abinjira. CNN yatangaje ko umuyoboro wa interineti ufunguye abaterankunga cyangwa imiryango, ushobora kwakira ibyifuzo kandi umaze kwakira ibyifuzo birenga 4000 kugeza ubu.
mt0: <pad> Program ifasha abaturage b'Amerika n'abasangwa mu gihugu kugira ngo bafashe abahungabana bo muri Ukraine.</s>

en: Who qualifies under the program? Ukrainians, or an immediate family member of a Ukrainian citizen. They must have a U.S. sponsor and have been a resident of Ukraine as of February 11.
kin: Ninde wujuje ibisabwa muri gahunda? Abanya Ukraine, cyangwa umuryango wa hafi wumuturage wa Ukraine. Bagomba kugira umuterankunga w’Amerika kandi bakaba batuye muri Ukraine guhera ku ya 11 Gashyantare.
mt0: <pad> Ni nde ushobora guhabwa viza muri iyi gahunda? Abanyaukraine, cyangwa umuryango w'ibya hafi w'umunyaukraine. Bagomba kuba bafite umuyobozi wa Amerika kandi bamaze kuba mu gihugu cya Ukraine kuva muri Gashyantare.</s>

en: What are the requirements? They must pass security checks — including a fingerprint and an FBI name check and biographic and biometric screening — and meet public health requirements, such as having the proper vaccinations, before entering the U.S.
kin: Ni ibihe bisabwa? Bagomba gutsinda igenzura ry'umutekano - harimo igikumwe no kugenzura izina rya FBI no gusuzuma biografiya na biometrike - kandi bujuje ibyangombwa byubuzima rusange, nko kugira inkingo zikwiye, mbere yo kwinjira muri Amerika
mt0: <pad> Ni ibihe bisabwa? Bagomba gutsinda imicungire y'umutekano — harimo gufata igitoki n'ibimenyetso bya FBI n'ibyo kumenya umuntu n'uko umuntu asa — kandi bagomba guhisha ibisabwa by'ubuzima bw'abaturage, nko kuba bafite imiti y'indwara ihagije, mbere yo kwinjira muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.</s>

en: Those approved will be allowed to travel to the U.S., be considered for humanitarian parole on a case-by-case basis, stay in the country for two years, and apply for work permits.
kin: Abemerewe bazemererwa kujya muri Amerika, bafatwe nk'agateganyo ku buntu, bagume mu gihugu imyaka ibiri, kandi basabe uruhushya rwo gukora.
mt0: <pad> Abatorwa bazaba bafite uburenganzira bwo gutembera muri Amerika, gukurikiranwa ku buryo butandukanye ku rwego rw'ubutabazi bw'abanyabyaha, kuba muri Amerika imyaka ibiri, no gusaba uburenganzira bwo gukora.</s>

en: "The United States strongly encourages Ukrainians seeking refuge in the United States who do not have and are not eligible for a visa to seek entry via Uniting for Ukraine from Europe.
kin: Amerika irashishikariza cyane Abanya Ukraine bashaka ubuhungiro muri Amerika badafite kandi batemerewe kubona viza yo kwinjira binyuze muri Uniting for Ukraine bava i Burayi.
mt0: <pad> Uburusiya bushishikariza cyane abaturage b'Abanyaukraine bashaka ubuhungiro muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batafite viza kandi batashoboye kuyobora mu gihugu cya Ukraine binyuze mu nzira yitwa "Urubuga rw'Ubumwe bw'Uburayi" bava muri Eropa.</s>

en: This will be the safest and most efficient way to pursue temporary refuge in the United States," a DHS statement said.
kin: Ubu ni bwo buryo bwizewe kandi bunoze bwo guhungira by'agateganyo muri Amerika. Ibihugu , nk'uko byatangajwe na DHS.
mt0: <pad> "Ibi bizaba uburyo bwiza kandi bufite umusaruro mwiza bwo gushaka ubuhungiro mu gihe gito muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika," a DHS statement said.</s>

en: Who qualifies as a sponsor?
kin: Ninde wujuje ibisabwa nk'umuterankunga?
mt0: <pad> Ni nde ushobora kuba umufatanyabikorwa?</s>

en: U.S. citizens and other residents who hold lawful status in the United States or who are beneficiaries of Deferred Enforced Departure, Temporary Protected Status, or Deferred Action, among others.
kin: Abanyamerika hamwe nabandi baturage bafite ubuzima gatozi muri Reta zunzubumwe zamerika cyangwa abagenerwabikorwa bagenda batinze, Imiterere irinzwe byigihe gito, cyangwa ibikorwa byadindijwe, nibindi.
mt0: <pad> U.S. citizens and other residents who hold lawful status in the United States or who are beneficiaries of Deferred Enforced Departure, Temporary Protected Status, or Deferred Action, among others.</s>

en: Sponsors will be required to prove they can financially support the refugee while they are in the U.S. They also need to pass security and background vetting "to protect against exploitation and abuse." The Ukrainian applicant will receive authorization only after everything is verified, including that the sponsor has the means to support them while they are in the U.S.
kin: Abaterankunga bazasabwa kwerekana ko bashobora gutera inkunga impunzi mu gihe bari muri Amerika Bakeneye kandi kunyura mu mutekano no kugenzura "kurinda ihohoterwa no guhohoterwa." Usaba ukomoka muri Ukraine azahabwa uruhushya nyuma yuko byose bigenzuwe, harimo ko umuterankunga afite uburyo bwo kubatera inkunga mugihe bari muri Amerika
mt0: <pad> Sponsors will be required to prove they can financially support the refugee while they are in the U.S. They also need to pass security and background vetting "to protect against exploitation and abuse." The Ukrainian applicants will receive authorization only after everything is verified, including that the sponsor has the means to support them while they are in the U.S.</s>

en: Who is not eligible for parole under the program?
kin: Ninde utemerewe kurekurwa muri gahunda?
mt0: <pad> Ni nde udashobora gusohoka muri iyi gahunda?</s>

en: Ukrainian citizens already in the U.S. are not eligible for parole under Uniting for Ukraine.
kin: Abenegihugu ba Ukraine basanzwe muri Amerika ntibemerewe kurekurwa muri Uniting for Ukraine.
mt0: <pad> Ubwo uvuga ko utabizi, ntiwitege ko abaturage b'Abanyaukraine bari muri Amerika bataremerewe gusohoka mu Rwanda ku rwego rwo gufata ingamba.</s>

en: However, they can apply for Temporary Protected Status, which is another form of humanitarian relief that allows people to legally stay and work in the U.S.
kin: Ariko, barashobora gusaba Imiterere irinzwe byigihe gito, nubundi buryo bwo gutabara imbabare butuma abantu bagumaho kandi bakorera muri Amerika.
mt0: <pad> Ariko, bashobora gusaba Status y'Umutekano mu gihe gito, ikaba ari undi buryo bw'ubutabazi bwa kiremwamuntu bubafasha kubaho no gukora mu gihugu cya Amerika ku rwego rwo hejuru.</s>

en: What about those arriving at the U.S.-Mexico border?
kin: Tuvuge iki ku bashitse ku mupaka wa Amerika na Mexico?
mt0: <pad> Ariko se abantu bazaba bageze ku rubibe rw'Amerika na Meki?</s>

en: Citing safety issues, U.S. officials have urged Ukrainians not to travel to Mexico in hopes of entering the United States. In addition, U.S. Customs and Border Protection has no place to hold them while they go through the Uniting for Ukraine vetting process.
kin: Abayobozi ba Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika basabye ibibazo by’umutekano, basabye abanya Ukraine kutajya muri Mexico bizeye kwinjira muri Amerika. Byongeye kandi, gasutamo yo muri Amerika no kurinda imipaka nta hantu na hamwe yabifata mu gihe banyuze muri gahunda yo gusuzuma Ukraine.
mt0: <pad> U.S. officials have urged Ukrainians not to travel to Mexico in hopes of entering the United States. In addition, U.S. Customs and Border Protection has no place to hold them while they go through the Uniting for Ukraine vetting process.</s>

en: Since Uniting for Ukraine's launch on Monday, Ukrainians who arrive at U.S. ports of entry without a valid visa or without preauthorization to travel to the United States through the Uniting for Ukraine program will be denied entry and told to apply to the program.
kin: Kuva Guhuriza hamwe kwa Ukraine ku wa mbere, Abanya-Ukraine bageze ku byambu by’Amerika binjira nta viza yemewe cyangwa batabiherewe uburenganzira bwo kujya muri Amerika binyuze muri gahunda y’ubumwe bwa Ukraine bazangirwa kwinjira kandi babwirwa gusaba iyo gahunda.
mt0: <pad> Kuva ubwo Uniting for Ukraine yatangiye ku wa Mbere, Abanyaukraine bazabagera mu bibuga by'injira muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batari bafite viza itandukanye cyangwa nta rimwe bahawe uburenganzira bwo gukora ingendo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika binyuze mu buryo bwa Uniting for Ukraine bazaba baniwe kwinjira kandi basabwa kwiyandikisha muri iyo gahunda.</s>

en: Biden officials hope this will curb the number of Ukrainian migrants seeking humanitarian parole along the border.
kin: Abayobozi ba Biden bizeye ko ibyo bizagabanya umubare w’abimukira bo muri Ukraine bashaka gufungurwa by’umupaka.
mt0: <pad> Biden officials hope this will curb the number of Ukrainian migrants seeking humanitarian parole along the border.</s>

en: Those at the border must apply under the rules of Uniting for Ukraine, meaning they must have a qualifying sponsor or a non-government agency willing to sponsor them in the U.S. for up to two years. And they need to have all required vaccinations and pass background checks.
kin: Abari ku mipaka bagomba gusaba hakurikijwe amategeko agenga ubumwe bwa Ukraine, bivuze ko bagomba kugira umuterankunga wujuje ibyangombwa cyangwa ikigo kitegamiye kuri leta cyifuza kubatera inkunga muri Amerika mugihe cyimyaka ibiri. Kandi bakeneye kugira inkingo zose zisabwa no gutsinda igenzura.
mt0: <pad> Those ku nkombe bagomba gusaba mu mategeko ya Uniting for Ukraine, bisobanura ko bagomba kuba bafite umuyobozi ushoboye cyangwa ibigo bya leta bifuza kubashyigikira muri Amerika kugeza ku myaka ibiri. Bagomba kandi kuba bafite imiti yose ikenewe kandi bamaze gutsinda ibibazo by'imyitwarire.</s>

en: The Biden administration announced the private sponsorship initiative as another way the U.S. hopes to achieve President Biden's commitment to welcome up to 100,000 Ukrainians displaced by the Russian military invasion.
kin: Ubuyobozi bwa Biden bwatangaje gahunda yo gutera inkunga abikorera ku giti cyabo nk'ubundi buryo Amerika yizeye kuzagera ku cyemezo cya Perezida Biden cyo kwakira abanya Ukraine bagera ku 100.000 bavanywe mu byabo n’igitero cy’ingabo z’Uburusiya.
mt0: <pad> Ubutegetsi bwa Biden bwatangaje icyo gikorwa cy'abafatanyabikorwa bwite nk'uburyo bushya Amerika iteganya gukora kugira ngo igeze ku ntego ya Perezida Biden yo gutura abantu bagera ku 100.000 bamaze kwirukanwa n'intambara y'ingabo za Russia.</s>

en: As of Thursday, almost 5.4 million refugees have since left Ukraine, according to U.N. data.
kin: Nk’uko amakuru ya Amerika abitangaza, kugeza ku wa kane, impunzi zigera kuri miliyoni 5.4 zimaze kuva muri Ukraine.
