en: "Mercs [mercenaries] working in Africa is an established norm" thanks in part to decades of operations by contractors from South Africa, said Jason Blazakis of the New York-based Soufan Group think tank.
kin: Jason Blazakis wo mu kigo gifasha mu gutekereza cya Soufan Group gikorera i New York yagize ati: "Abacanshuro  bakorera muri Afurika ni itegeko  ryashyizweho".
mt0: <pad> "Mercs [mercenaries] working in Africa is an established norm" thanks in part to decades of operations by contractors from South Africa, said Jason Blazakis of the New York-based Soufan Group think tank.</s>

en: "The Wagner folks are walking through a door that has long been open to their ilk," he added.
kin: Yongeyeho ati: "Umuryango umaze igihe kinini ufunguye ku bantu bashaja kwinjira muri Wagner""
mt0: <pad> "The Wagner folks are walking through a door that has long been open to their ilk," he added.</s>

en: No information is publicly available about the group's size or finances.
kin: Nta makuru yashyizwe ahagaragara kubyerekeye ingano y' abagize iri tsinda cyangwa kubijyanye n'imari yaryo.
mt0: <pad> Nta makuru y'abaturage n'amafaranga agaragazwa ku kigo.</s>

en: But around Africa, the Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS) in Washington has found evidence since 2016 of Russian soldiers of fortune in Sudan, South Sudan, Libya, the Central African Republic (CAR), Madagascar and Mozambique.
kin: Ariko hirya no hino muri Afurika, Ikigo gishinzwe ibijyanye n'ubushakashatsi mpuzamahanga (CSIS) i Washington cyabonye ibimenyetso kuva mu 2016 by’abasirikare b’Uburusiya bagiye  muri Sudani, Sudani yepfo, Libiya, Repubulika ya Centrafrique (CAR), Madagasikari na Mozambike.
mt0: <pad> Ariko mu Burasirazuba bw'Afurika, icyo kigo cy'ubushakashatsi ku bihugu by'amahanga (CSIS) muri Washington cyagaragaje ibimenyetso kuva muri 2016 bya ruswa y'abasirikare b'ubutegetsi muri Sudani, Sudani y'Amajyepfo, Libiya, Republique Centrafricaine (CAR), Madagascar na Mozambike.</s>

en: Botswana, Burundi, Chad, the Comoros, the Democratic Republic of Congo, Congo-Brazzaville, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Nigeria and Zimbabwe are also on the CSIS's list.
kin: Botswana, Burundi, Tchad, Comoros, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, Congo-Brazzaville, Gineya, Gineya-Bissau, Nijeriya na Zimbabwe na byo biri ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bizagibwamo na CSIS.
mt0: <pad> Botswana, Burundi, Chad, the Comoros, the Democratic Republic of Congo, Congo-Brazzaville, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Nigeria and Zimbabwe are also on the list of CSIS.</s>

en: In Africa "there is a convergence of many states' interests, including China's," Alexey Mukhin of the Moscow-based Centre for Political Information told AFP.
kin: Alexey Mukhin wo mu kigo gishinzwe amakuru ya politiki i Moscou yabwiye ibiro ntaramakuru by'Abafaransa ati: "Muri Afurika" hari ihuriro ry' ibihugu byinshi’i z’ibihugu byinshi rigamije iterambere  harimo n’Ubushinwa. "
mt0: <pad> Infurika "hahari isano y'ibyo ibihugu byinshi bifite, harimo na China," Alexey Mukhin of the Moscow-based Centre for Political Information told AFP.</s>

en: "Every state has the right to defend its business assets," he added.
kin: Yongeyeho ati: "Buri gihugu gifite uburenganzira bwo kurengera umutungo wacyo mu bucuruzi ."
mt0: <pad> "Ubutegetsi bwose bufite uburenganzira bwo gufata inyungu zacyo mu gihugu," yagize ati "</s>

en: Wagner does not officially exist, with no company registration, tax returns or organizational chart to be found.
kin: Wagner ntabwo izwi  kumugaragaro, si sosiyete yanditswe izwi,ntigaragaza imisoro itanga cyangwa inzego zayo z'ubuyobozi.
mt0: <pad> Wagner ntabwo ihari mu buryo bwemewe, nta n'amakuru y'uko yashinzwe, nta raporo y'amakori cyangwa igishushanyo mbonera cy'umuryango wagaragaye.</s>

en: When the EU wanted to sanction the group in 2020, it targeted Russian oligarch Yevgeny Prigozhin, an ally of President Vladimir Putin who is suspected of running Wagner.
kin: Igihe Umuryango w'ubumwe bw’ibihugu by’Uburayi washakaga kwemerera uyu mutwe mu 2020, wibasiwe na  oligarch wo mu Burusiya Yevgeny Prigozhin, umufasha wa Perezida Vladimir Putin akaba akekwaho kuyobora Wagner.
mt0: <pad> When the EU wanted to sanction the group in 2020, it targeted Russian oligarch Yevgeny Prigozhin, an ally of President Vladimir Putin who is suspected of running Wagner.</s>

en: It imposed further sanctions in December last year when mercenaries' arrival in Mali appeared certain — drawing accusations of "hysteria" from Moscow.
kin: Wongeye gufatirwa ibihano mu Kuboza umwaka ushize ubwo abacanshuro byagaragaye ko bageze  muri Mali.  bashinja "hysteria" i Moscou.
mt0: <pad> It added new sanctions in December last year when mercenaries' arrival in Mali appeared certain — drawing accusations of "hysteria" from Moscow.</s>

en: Western experts say military contractors are embedded in Russia's official forces like intelligence agencies and the army, providing plausible deniability for Moscow.
kin: Impuguke z’iburengerazuba zivuga ko ingabo za gisirikare zinjiye mu butegetsi bw’Uburusiya nk’inzego z’ubutasi n’ingabo, ibyo ariko Moscou ikabihakana.
mt0: <pad> Abashakashatsi b'Abanyamerika bavuga ko abakora imirimo ya gisirikare bakorera mu ngabo za Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Burayi, nk'ibigo by'iperereza n'ingabo, bityo Moscow ikaba ishobora kugira icyo ikomeza guhakana.</s>

en: Their deployment to African countries aims to "enable Russia to... regain this sphere of influence" that fell away with the collapse of the Soviet Union, said CSIS researcher Catrina Doxsee.
kin: Koherezwa kwabo mu bihugu bya Afurika bigamije "gutuma Uburusiya buzahuka... kugira ngo buzahure ubukungu  bwagizweho ingaruka no gusenyuka kw'Abasoviyeti, nk'uko byatangajwe n'umushakashatsi wa CSIS, Catrina Doxsee.
mt0: <pad> Abatabona ntibamenya</s>

en: The mercenaries' presence has been growing even faster since a 2019 Russia-Africa summit.
kin: Abacanshuro bariyongereye cyane kuva  2019aho inama nyafurika n'uburusiya itangiriye..
mt0: <pad> Ahari abarwanyi b'abasirikare, ubutwari bwarushaho kwiyongera cyane kuva mu nama ya 2019 y'umuryango w'abibumbye na ruswa.</s>

en: Moscow has been active "especially in what has traditionally been France's zone of influence" in former colonies like CAR and Mali, said Djallil Lounnas, a researcher at Morocco's Al Akhawayn university.
kin: Djallil Lounnas, umushakashatsi muri kaminuza ya Al Akhawayn ya Maroc, yatangaje ko Moscou yagize uruhare "cyane cyane mu byahoze ari akarere k’Ubufaransa".
mt0: <pad> Moscow yagize uruhare "mu gihe cyose mu bihugu byabaye ibikoresho bya France" mu bice byahoze ari uturere nka CAR na Mali, Djallil Lounnas, umushakashatsi muri kaminuza ya Al Akhawayn muri Maroke, yavuze.</s>

en: While military contractors sometimes shepherd Russian arms sales, the revenue "really pales compared with the profit they are able to generate from mining concessions and access to natural resources," Doxsee said.
kin: Doxsee yagize ati: "Nubwo abashoramari rimwe na rimwe bagerageza kugurisha ibirwanisho by’Uburusiya, amafaranga binjiza ni make  rwose ugereranije n’inyungu bashobora kubona mu bucukuzi bw’amabuye y'agaciro no kubona umutungo kamere ".
mt0: <pad> Nubwo ubwato buhabwa n'ingabo rusange, amafaranga avuyemo "ntabwo ahangana n'inyungu ishobora gukura mu mihanda y'ubutaka n'inyubako z'ibikoresho by'amabuye," Doxsee yavuze.</s>

en: That makes unstable countries with mineral or hydrocarbon wealth prime customers — such as in Syria where the mercenaries first became known to the wider public.
kin: Ibyo bituma ibihugu bifite ubutunzi kamere bihungabana kandi byari bifite abakiriya ba mbere. Twavuga muri rusange  nko muri Siriya aho abacanshuro bamenyekanye bwa mbere.
mt0: <pad> It makes unstable countries with mineral or hydrocarbon wealth prime customers — such as in Syria where the mercenaries first became known to the wider public.</s>

en: No questions asked
kin: Nta kibazo cyabajijwe
mt0: <pad> No questions asked.</s>

en: Lounnas said that another advantage for clients is a lack of friction over human rights and democracy that might come with Western partners.
kin: Lounnas yavuze ko indi nyungu ku bakiriya ari ukutumvikana kukijyanye n' uburenganzira bwa muntu na demokarasi bishobora kuzanwa n'abafatanyabikorwa bo mu Burengerazuba.
mt0: <pad> Lounnas yavuze ko undi nkuru ku bafatanyabikorwa ni uko nta kibazo gihari ku bijyanye n'uburenganzira bw'abantu n'iterambere rya demokarasi bishobora kuza mu bufatanye bwa Buraya.</s>

en: "Russia has its interests. It doesn't ask questions," he added.
kin: Yongeyeho ati: "Uburusiya bufite inyungu zabwo. Ntabwo bubaza ibibazo".
mt0: <pad> "Uburusiya bufite inyungu zabwo. Ntituzambaza ibibazo," yongeyeho.</s>

en: Reports of violence and abuse on the ground suggest that same latitude may extend to the mercenaries themselves.
kin: Raporo  z' ihohoterwa hanze aha zerekana ko uburinganire bushobora kugera no kubikorera ubwabo.
mt0: <pad> Raporo z'ihohoterwa n'ibikorwa by'ubugizi bwa nabi ku butaka bivuze ko ubwo burenganzira bushobora no gukubita abakozi b'ingabo.</s>

en: In the CAR, the United Nations is probing an alleged massacre during a joint operation by government forces and Wagner fighters.
kin: Muri CAR, Umuryango w’abibumbye urimo gukora iperereza ku bwicanyi bwabaye hagati y'ingabo za leta n’abarwanyi ba Wagner.
mt0: <pad> Mu gihugu cya Republika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, umuryango w'abibumbye uri gukurikirana ibyaha byavuzwe ko byakorewe mu gihe cy'ingabo za leta hamwe n'abasirikare ba Wagner.</s>

en: One military source told AFP that more than 50 people died, some in "summary executions."
kin: Hari igitabo kimwe cya gisirikare cyatangarije AFP ko abantu barenga 50 bapfuye, mucyo bise "kwicwa muri make."
mt0: <pad> Amakuru y'ingabo yabwiye AFP ko abantu barenga 50 bapfuye, bamwe muri bo mu "guhagarikwa ku ngufu."</s>

en: On Thursday, the European Union said it would not resume military training in the CAR — suspended since mid-December — unless the country's soldiers stop working for Wagner.
kin: Ku wa kane, Umuryango w’ubumwe bw’ibihugu by’Uburayi wavuze ko utazongera imyitozo ya gisirikare muri CAR - yahagaritswe kuva hagati mu Kuboza - keretse igihe  abasirikare b’iki gihugu bazaba bahagaritse gukorera Wagner.
mt0: <pad> Bye bye Wagner.</s>

en: Meanwhile the mercenaries' results do not always measure up to the hopes of the governments that hire them.
kin: Hagati aho ariko, ibikorwa by'abacanshuro ntabwo buri gihe bisibiza ibyifuzo bya guverinoma iba yabahaye akazi.
mt0: <pad> N'aho umuntu ashobora guhindura igitekerezo cye, ntiwabura kuvuga ko utabizi.</s>

en: In Libya, Russian mercenaries suffered heavy losses in Marshal Khalifa Haftar's year-long attempt to conquer the capital Tripoli, which was ultimately unsuccessful.
kin: Muri Libiya, abacanshuro b'Abarusiya bagize igihombo kinini muri Marshal Khalifa Haftar umwaka wose kukon bagerageje kwigarurira umurwa mukuru Tripoli, ariko ntibyashoboka.
mt0: <pad> Mu Libya, ingabo z'ubuyapani zagize uruhare runini mu gushaka gutera iburyo bw'umurwa mukuru Tripoli, icyo gihe byagenze nabi.</s>

en: And in Mozambique, the Russians retreated in the face of Islamic State group jihadists, ultimately losing out to South African competitors.
kin: Kandi muri Mozambike, Abarusiya igihe bari bateganye n' abajihadiste bo mu mutwe wa kisilamu basubira inyuma, nyuma baza nabo gutsindwa n’abarwanyi ba Afurika yepfo.
mt0: <pad> Na Mozambique, Abanyarusiya bahungabanyijwe n'abagize ubwoko bw'iterabwoba bwa Islamic State, mu nyuma bikaba byarangiye batsindwa n'abakinnyi bo muri Afurika y'Epfo.</s>

en: Although lacking language skills and experience with the terrain, Wagner "were picked because they were the cheapest", Doxsee said.
kin: Doxsee yavuze ko nubwo badafite ubumenyi bw’ururimi n'uburambe kuri ubu butaka, Wagner "batoranijwe kubera ko ari bo bahendutse".
mt0: <pad> Ariko nta bumenyi bw'ururimi n'ubumenyi ku bice, Wagner "batoranyijwe kubera ko bari abaguzi", Doxsee said.</s>

en: "They didn't have what it took to succeed," she added, noting that "they've had a fair few failures" across Africa.
kin: Yongeyeho ati: "Ntabwo bari bafite icyo basabwa kugira ngo batsinde." Yongeyeho ko "batsinzwe bitari bike" muri Afurika.
mt0: <pad> "Ntabwo bafite icyo gituma babasha gutsinda," yongeyeho, avuga ko "bafite imibare myinshi y'ibyagenze nabi" muri Afurika.</s>

en: Succeeding completely might actually harm the mercenaries' business model, which thrives on unrest, conflict and crisis.
kin: Intsinzi irashobora rwose kwangiza ibikorwa byubucuruzi bwabacanshuro, bitera imbere mumidugararo, amakimbirane nibibazo.
mt0: <pad> Bye bye mercenaries.</s>

en: "If a country such as the CAR hires them to train forces, to help them in their military efforts, its in their interest to accomplish that just well enough to continue to be employed," Doxsee said.
kin: Doxsee ati: "Niba igihugu nka CAR kibahaye akazi ko gutoza ingabo, no kubafasha mu bikorwa byabo bya gisirikare, ni ngombwa kubahiriza izo nshingano kugira ngo bakomeze guhabwa akazi".
mt0: <pad> "Iyo igihugu nk'u Rwanda gifashe abakozi kugira ngo bafashe ingabo zacyo gufata neza, bagafasha mu bikorwa byabo bya gisirikare, ni mu nyungu yabo gukora neza kugira ngo bakomeze kubaho," Doxsee yavuze.</s>

en: "If they actually were to do it well enough to resolve the conflict, they would no longer be needed."
kin: Baramutse babikoze neza bagakemura amakimbirane, ntibakongera gukenerwa
mt0: <pad> "Iyo bazaba babikoze neza enough kugira ngo bafashe gukemura ikibazo, ntibazaba bakeneye cyane."</s>
